User Reviews: The Banyan tree hotel is an excellent Hotel that made us feel very secured in these trying times. We needed a get away after many months of lock down as we were rather cautious of traveling. However the hotel went above and beyond to make us extremely comfortable not only due to their COVID19 management but also the Chief Concierge Mr. Jackie that we had the utmost pleasure to converse with during our stay. He gave us the most exciting recommendations for restaurant (that cater towards our very specific needs)as well as sights to visit that is off the beaten path, which in my opinion shows that his knowledge is very in-depth, personal and not taken out of your run of the mill guide book. Besides Mr. Jackie all the staff were very attentive and the hotel breath taking. We will consider the Banyan tree bangkok as the top of our list if we ever needed another break.
Name: Banyan Tree Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Not at all satisfactory, not sure why anyone would pay extra for this as the choices were very poor indeed...2nd class choices of not very much food and one choice of white wine only, cheap gin and only cheap local beer...not impressed
Name: Banyan Tree Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I’ve been staying there for couple of nights. My room was 4110, quite old. We reserved a dinner buffet at Hotel’s restaurant (rom sai). We never been told that the food range will be cut out or unavailable. The experience was horrible, very limited food selection. I can find a better buffet in any 3-star-hotel in BKK with 1/4 of full price.The cost of thb 1,799++ per pp is a real ripped off. They offer us 50% off after a big complain. Even after discount was still overcharged.Totally not recommended. :(
Name: Banyan Tree Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: We had a staycation at Banyan Tree Bangkok for our wedding anniversary. We  also reserved a table at the Moon bar for dinner. The atmosphere was great. The panoramic view was stunning. The food was so delicious. The service made the night perfect for us. Khun Lek was very friendly and provided excellent service. He even took a great picture of us and printed it. Definitely, the best souvenir.
Name: Banyan Tree Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Very good service here. I booked with hungryhub promotion. The food are good and the amount is appropriate for us. The staff who name's Lek is so nice. He know what to do and recommend many good dishes. He also has good photographic techneques. Recommend to come here.
Name: Banyan Tree Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: This is my first stay at Banyan Tree Hotel. Overall experience very impassive. Hotel staff very helpful specially Khun Boyo at concierge. His service very outstanding and always call me my name. We will come back for sure
Name: Banyan Tree Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: This time we stayed on 48th FL. The room is large enough and sparkling clean, well equipped with everything we need. The view of Bangkok catched our eyes. All officers provide us great service which we really appreciated.
Name: Banyan Tree Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: We had such a memorable experience with our first family stay at Banyan Tree Bangkok. All the staffs were professional, nice and friendly. While waiting for checking in at the lobby Khun Sombat and Khun Nok took very good care of us. They even offered some cakes and drinks for our children. The chief concierge Khun Jackie, with his epic service, he handsomely upgraded our room to one-bedroom suite which was very spacious with everything so fresh and clean. They also offer various kinds of complimentary tropical fruits. Our children love it so much that they wouldn’t want to go anywhere else. The Moon Bar at the rooftop is a very special place to visit with a nice scenery where we could spend time to relax and see most of Bangkok beautiful landscape from the top view in both daylight or at night. All facilities are fantastic. We would highly recommend you not to miss this place when you visit Bangkok.
Name: Banyan Tree Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Best hotel in Bangkok hands down and would highly recommend. The restaurants, to the world-class bar and the friendliness of the staff make this place very special. The location on the water in an historic part of Bangkok is very nice too.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Nice atmosphere with great delicacies. Chef Ann creates amazing desserts and takes great care of us. Their clotted cream and jam are homemade and superb. Definitely worth the price, must-try afternoon tea. Surely is one of the best in Bangkok.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I had the first staycation at here on Nov 2020 and don't hesitate to go back. I went to Capella again on Jan 2021 and plan the third time on April!The reason that i love here is they are the best in many things, room, dinning and amenities.I started to try here because I heard that Capella would like to be the best in Bangkok. Yes! They are worth it.The first time is the best but second time they can do better:)Especially thank one of your team Mr.Ted.Anyway just a bit comment about my this time culturist, she is good but dont smile much:)
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Pleasant staycation with friendly and supportive staffs. Breakfast selection was great and had great time at the spa. Facilities are brand new and well maintain. We got upgraded to an amazing room with nice view. Cote and Stella were  amazing. Recommend!
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: After its opening last year, I always had an eyes on staying here. Finally I had a chance to stay at Capella Bangkok. I would say staycation more than 24 hours here was beyond my expectation. Hotel facilities and design were good however what made this place so special were attentive staffs. From culturist/check in staffs who can literally remember our names. Our favorite staffs were at pool as they could really remember our names the other days as I believed there were so many guests visiting the pool. Cote was the best and became my top 3 favorite in Bangkok. Staffs were brilliant as well. The only down side, but not so disturbing, was the misspelling of my name on welcoming letter, as I believed Thai name may be quite difficult sometimes. The room was spacious and very well equipped. Balcony really made for such chilled out, even in this super hot weather. Writing this long, I would say I highly recommended this hotel for anyone's stay or staycation in Bangkok.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Exemplary service, impeccable attention to detail to which Saachi (our cavalier king charles spaniel) refuses to stay anywhere else. From a customised bed and michelin room service, to chilled italian water blueberries, bananas and peanut butter by the river. I rate this hotel 7 paws stars. The staff welcomed my sassy fur self with open arms and departure felt like we were saying goodbye to our family. Cannot recommend enough!
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: My stayed at Capella from last month.       My unforgettable moment journey start from  the moment that arrival to the hotel. When entering at lobby which is tea lounge. Floor to ceiling window facing to the Chao Phraya River, unique design and interior that make you would like to take a snapshot then post via story social media. Time to check in, The Living Room is a place that offer respite from the vibrant bustle beyond its wall. A guest who is not stay at the hotel can not access to this area. So privacy. Bubbles and Bonbons upon arrival so privilege luxury. Welcome drink at Capella is not ordinary same as the others. Capella Sparkling Wine is an answer for Capella guest. They will make them “Beyond Expectation”. Riverfront Premier Room for my stay. So impressed. Stunning Panoramic View of Chao Phraya River from floor to ceiling directly facing which were unforgettable. Room style is a residentially with a private balcony. Spacious walk-in wardrobe. Generous marble bathroom. Bespoke toiletries such as Marvis toothpaste etc. Complimentary non-alcoholic mini- bar. Acqua Panna Natural Mineral Drink. Tranquility Calm and Relax feels home once you step inside. In the same way feels luxury in details that were extraordinary experiences. The resort activities were a great for a guest . Especially Cin Cin Hour i would said that “Do not miss”. Breakfast near the river so memorable with premium quality choice of variety food. Japanese style a la carte food must try it. Shibuya Toast must order. I would highly recommend everyone should stay here. You will not be disappointed. One night i would say it is not enough. All outlets at Capella you should try. Stella, Côte, Phra Nakorn, Tea Lounge. All were great in own style. A moment experiences that become lifelong memories which could not happens without Capella Staff. All Capella Staff were Top-Noted hospitality services. Special mentioned staff: K.Joy who is my best No.1 service excellence in highest levels of hospitality, K.Nisa Stella, K.Pony, K. Oat Pool. K.Art Côte. Especially K.John Blanco who is always took care and greeted closely with guest with friendly warm welcome smile. A moment when check out, Some hotel after check out will let guest leave without great experiences and memorable but at Capella not like that. K. Pony who is a person who check out for my stay and fond farewell and also my art hotel tour. So excellence in hospitality services. That was unforgettable experiences. She escort us to the pier to leave to hotel as last fond farewell. I think this process it is not necessary to do but not in Capella Bangkok. Truly Ultra Luxury Hotel.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: When I stayed at Four Seasons Bangkok a few weeks ago I noticed that the new Capella hotel was immediately next door and found out that both properties actually have the same owner which raised my interest.  I decided to try Capella for the first time and was more impressed than by our stay at Four Seasons.  I suspect some travelers will choose Four Seasons based on name recognition and the lower price tag for the entry level rooms but in my opinion Capella is well worth the price premium and beats Four Seasons in almost every aspect.  Capella views their main competitor to be Mandarin Oriental rather than FS.  I found the service at Capella to be more down to earth therefore appealing to a different age bracket than the more formal Mandarin Oriental.  Many people generally consider MO to be the #1 hotel in Bangkok and I predict that in short order Capella will gain a significant number of fans and will eventually overtake MO as the top luxury hotel in the city.  To maximize the advantage of being located on the river, the vast majority of rooms at Capella are directly facing the river, even the entry level rooms.  This is quite different from Four Seasons where the first two room types have no view or only partial views.  For direct river views you need the third room type at FS and for this reason alone it automatically makes price comparisons between the two hotels flawed if only comparing the price of the cheapest rooms at both properties.  In other words, Capella is less of a price premium over FS than we would be led to believe at first glance.The entry level room at Capella is the Riverfront room type which are the rooms on the 4th floor only.  The second room type Riverfront Premier is identical but located on floors 5-10.  Those rooms avoid the main drawback of the entry level rooms which is that they are sitting immediately above the Verandah rooms and have less privacy because from the terrace of the Verandah rooms, if looking back up you can partially see in the living room of the 4th floor rooms despite the tinted windows.  The third category of rooms used to be Verandah but because they have been far more popular than expected, the hotel moved them up to 4th room type.  The Verandah rooms are the same as Riverfront and Riverfront Premier except that instead of having a small terrace, they have a large terrace with a private plunge pool which makes them unique.  This room type capitalizes on the strength of Capella which is location and having river views.  Those rooms are hard to beat for any other hotel in Bangkok.  Privacy was fairly good on each side of the pool due to vegetation providing a natural wall between rooms.  Our room was similar as Four Seasons which is good but perhaps not the highest quality build in the city.  The materials did not always come across as ultra-luxury for example the cabinets, some of the furniture, and for flooring there was too much carpet to my taste – the hardwood floor was only a small fringe on the sides of the bedroom; quite narrow so nobody could walk there.  In that regard I think Waldorf Astoria and Sindhorn Kempinski feel more luxurious with more expansive hardwood floors.  The bathroom was smaller at Capella than at Four Seasons and the bathtub being in the middle of the bathroom was a bit cumbersome, and similar to FS the toilet was not a Toto washlet, another luxury miss in my opinion and a notch below what can be found in the suites at Waldorf Astoria and Park Hyatt, and also found at lower levels of hotels such as Athenee and Le Meridien.  Bathroom amenities at Capella were great, 100 ml metallic bottles custom-made for Capella Bangkok from La Bottega which reminded me of the bottles at Mandarin Oriental.For people who want to spend even more, Capella also has villas right on the river rather than the rooms in the main building, the villas also having their own private plunge pool as well but having the advantage of more privacy because they are not visually exposed to rooms above them.   Service during our stay was not perfect but it would be unfair to expect a 6-month old hotel to perform as well as MO which is over 100 years old and one of the best service-oriented hotels in all of Asia.  Some minor mistakes were made for example when I asked if I could visit the Courtyard Suites I was told none were available because maintenance was currently there.  I believe if a customer wants to see new room types to steer future stays, they should propose alternatives (time or other rooms) rather than send me back.  Anyway, overall service was very friendly and down to earth, in contrast to the highly polished, formal, and professional service at MO.  This was the case at reception, in the restaurant, the bar, etc. and overall superior to what we experienced at Four Seasons which is almost an equally new hotel.  At Capella I should also note that they prepared a welcome arrangement in the room and also gave us a frame of the picture they took of us at check-in which was a nice touch.  I believe in the next few months Capella will continue to make some strides and be better positioned to rival MO although with a different style, and probably fitting to a different clientele profile than MO so maybe not direct competition.  Breakfast was mostly a la carte and I found the menu to be a step above The Siam, MO, and FS.  In my opinion the best luxurious breakfast in Bangkok remains 137 Pillars and the best buffet is Waldorf Astoria but Capella was definitely top 5 of those I tried before.  Breakfast included an in-house Champagne welcome drink, a Japanese breakfast set with grilled salmon (which was specifically excluded when we stayed at MO) among the several choices in the extensive a la carte menu.  Service could have been a bit better for small details, for example at Waldorf Astoria staff constantly refill drinks as soon as our glass is half empty and they promptly replace cutlery after every dish which was not always done at Capella in the morning.The Stella bar had live music and seems to be quite popular already as it was almost full even on week evenings.  Service was excellent with staff providing detailed explanations of their different types of in-house cocktails representing 4 countries: Thailand, China, India, and Japan.  While Mandarin Oriental has Le Normandie restaurant, at Capella they are attempting to outdo MO with the Côte restaurant from 3-Michelin starred chef Mauro Colagreco.  We tried their Inspiration Menu which was absolutely superb and the highlight of our stay, particularly service-wise which was highly attentive and personal.  Similar to Stella, it was surprising to find out that they were almost full already and in fact they expected to be fully booked starting in one week’s time.  Since I am pregnant we did not try the wine pairing but next time we dine at Côte I am looking forward to pick that option for a more complete experience.Overall while Capella was not perfect it did well in almost all aspects: (1) not the best room but if considering river views and especially the room types with a private pool it gives an edge over other hotels; (2) some minor service improvements are needed but already considerably ahead of FS and making guests feel comfortable at home; (3) the Stella bar can compete toe to toe with Bamboo bar at MO; (4) the fine dining Côte restaurant has potential to become the very best in the city, both food-wise and service-wise; and (5) location is as good as it gets for a leisure-oriented hotel.  The price point is similar to MO but rooms at Capella are far more spacious (60+ sqm) than the smallish room we had to MO last time (35 sqm) and while Capella is more expensive than FS if we compare to the rooms with river views at FS then the price difference becomes modest.  It should also be emphasized that FS is a big hotel with 300 rooms while Capella only has 100 rooms which is more appropriate for an ultra-luxury property and it will almost always be easier for Capella to deliver top notch service than FS.  I can highly recommend to luxury hotels lovers to try Capella and see if it meets what they are looking for - it did for us.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Big room and very nice amenities. Staff was very attentive and friendly. Great F&B offering, one of the best hotel breakfast I ve ever had. Auriga spa was phenomenon especially the vitality pool! Must try!
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Spent a weekend at the Verandah room at Capella. It’s a blissful experience, with the jacuzzi plunge pool to enjoy over a very serene river view. With a large terrace, we decide to order an in-room BBQ. To our surprise, a whole set of BBQ with dining table was set up with full staff service through the period - very glamorous setting in a cosy evening. Lots of complementaries  - Signature Champaign, unlimited imported mineral water, cake & fruit plates, mini bar, the Living Room service etc.. made the entire stay uplifting. Details of the room and the  entire hotel were clearly thought through carefully, and was excellently maintained.  Turndown and other services were beyond expectation in many regards, not to mention wet swimsuits were washed and dried back in a couple of hours without request.  All in all, it was more pricey than staycation at other luxury hotels in Bangkok, but really unique experience and worth the visit.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: My husband and I had our wedding and honeymoon at Capella Bangkok. We both had a truly wonderful and memorable experience. The property and its design are gorgeous and Capella Bangkok gets even more breathtaking from the first minute of walking in until the last day of our stay. The staff are all delightful, hospitable and efficient. They made our stay very comfortable, enjoyable and most of all unforgettable...We stayed at VERANDAH SUITE with spacious outdoor terrace with a jacuzzi plunge pool. The suite worth every penny because of its high quality room and its facilities. The amenities were impressive with excellent selection of materials (sustainable choices too with NO plastic!). There was unlimited complimentary Acqua Panna mineral water and non-alcoholic beverages being served throughout our stay. Loved it!For our wedding ceremony at Capella Bangkok, everything went above and beyond! My husband and I received so many positive compliments from our wedding guests about the perfect service quality, delicious food, beautiful property and amazing staff. We couldn’t be any happier. We’d like to take this opportunity and say a special ‘Thank you’ to some of the staff members who made our wedding and our stay at Capella Bangkok so memorable...Khun Pantip, thank you for being such a fantastic brand ambassador of Capella Bangkok, well presenting the property to us and made us feel that this property is the perfect place where we both wanted to get married. Your kind-hearted and honest personality impressed us so much and it also created great trust of Capella brand in both of us. Thanks for making our wedding dream came true! Khun Poupae, we both want to express our great appreciation to you who took care of us pre-, during- and post-wedding. Your finest attention to details gave us such a big peace of mind that our wedding would be flawless and it literally was on the wedding day! You led our wedding preparation and actual operations with high efficiency without any delay. Your team shown such a great team work and coordination. My husband and I could feel that this team is a “people of passion” team. I still remember the night prior to the wedding that Khun Phuk helped us with the final setup until late at night (we had a few last-minute requests to him and he managed to finished them all) and then we met him the next day early in the morning running the wedding ceremony until the end with his colleagues. Thank you for your hard work! Khun Nid, Thank you for being with the bride and groom during the wedding reception making sure we both were hydrated. You were always there next to us when we needed something like you could read our minds. Thank you very much for your kind hospitality.Last but not least, we wanted to thank Khun Fern for being with the bride at all time helping with the wedding dress even after the event :-). I knew it must have been very exhausted for you as my wedding dress was quite heavy! Thank you ever so much for your patience and care! You didn’t let me out of your sight of care. Impressive!Finally, we’d like to thank Capella Bangkok’s General Manager for hiring and retaining the best people. It is not just the rooms and the property that make a hotel stay a wonderful one – it is how your people care for our needs. We are extremely grateful you have an amazing team at your property!Lastly, we highly recommend Capella Bangkok to anyone looking for the perfect and unforgettable stay in Bangkok. Capella has become our favorite hotel brand which we will surely travel to other Capella properties around the world to experience the top-notch hospitality!
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I go to many hotel for afternoon tea and this place is the best for me for now. Khun Ann informed about cake and present them cleary. She knows her cake well and help me choose the suitable cakes. Tea can refill as i want. Everything is delicious and worth to go back again with family or friends.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I went to Capella for celebrate my aniversary and i got the surprise from hotel maked me happy especially cake & balloon. Thank you everyone who make it special. Water in room is the best, furniture is great, bed makes me want to sleep all day, pool is clean but too much flies and insect in pool and i think light is too dark for me.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: The staff in the hotel is super nice and whenever i asked for the direction, they scouted me over to the destination. The boat experience is unique, and spa is very popular, I think better to book it before check in next time.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: The Capella Bangkok make my date exceptionally memorable.All bites are beautiful and tasty, additionally all staff service are beyond my expectation.The chef (mine is Khun Ann) will come, serve and introduce us all dessert at you seat to ensure enjoyment for your teatime.The tearoom even come with complementary birthday cake for my girlfriend.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I am appreciated with all the services from all friendly staffs. The Auriga wellness is the best place to enjoy massage with quality facial brands like 111skin and Aesop. I really enjoy Vitality pool with the 5D shower experienced. It's my favorite hotel in Bangkok at this moments. I'll return for the second night :)
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: My husband and I first visited Capella Bangkok in November 2020 to try their famous Thai food at Phra Nakhon, we loved the food there so much that we revisited a few more times in the following weeks. Chef Lek and Phra Nakhon never disappointed us, most dishes are very authentic, some with a twist but they came out great. The staffs even remembered our names and what we’re allergic to on our following visits.We were very impressed with the food and services so we decided to have our engagement at Capella. K.Poupae has always been helpful since day 1 of preparation process until we check out, she was more than just an assistant or a hotel sales/staff, but rather a friend who’s always been there for us. The function came out better than we expected and that meant a lot to us on our big day, big thanks to K.Poupe, K.Tle and the operation team. Capella Culturists K.Pam, K.Arther and K.Suzie were also of great help to us.Their High Tea is a must for any dessert enthusiast and tea lover, our family was impressed with the quality and craftsmanship of every piece of dessert from Chef Constans. This is by far my most favourite high tea in Bangkok.We were also lucky to get a dinner table at Côte, the new talk-of-the-town in Bangkok. Most dishes were outstanding and exciting, very creative combination of ingredients. The staffs were professional, knowledgable and highly attentive. This is one of the best fine-dinings in Bangkok that you can’t miss! Special thanks to K.Sutut and K.Art, you have made our dinner a memorable one.The whole Capella experience we had on the past months was way beyond our expectation, we would like to thank everyone and hope to see you all again soon.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I have stayed at almost all of the 5-star hotels in Bangkok and it wouldn't be difficult for me to find "good" hotels here. However, finding a hotel that gives me a "wow" is a different story and thus much more challenging. The Capella Bangkok truly gave me that "wow" experience for which I am not sure if I can find any other places in Bangkok that can do the same. The service here is absolutely world class and everything is so personalised that makes me feel that the hotel truly cares about every single detail of its guests. My  culturist, Khun Pam took such a great care of me and my wife right from checkin to bidding us farewell at our car which really make our staycation so memorable. We got a riverfront premier room on the 10th floor which was very classy and elegant with spectacular view of the Chaopraya river.  I have stayed at almost all hotels by the Chaopraya river and I can say with confidence that the view here is truly the best.We also had a fantastic time for our dinner at Cote restaurant. Each dish was prepared with great skills and premium ingredients. I also wish to thank khun Sutut for providing excellent service and Khun Jay, the sommelier who is very knowledegable and made excellent wine choice suggestions. Throught my whole stay, everything was so perfect. But if I can give a small suggestion, maybe my roon was quite too warm in the afternoon as the sun was directly facing the window and the aircon was already working at its full capacity. Last but not least, I can say without any reservation that up until now the Capella Bangkok is one of the few places that gave me the "wow" factor and among these few places, the Capella Bangkok surely stands as No.1 in my mind now.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Excellent service​ from​ all​ crew.​ Thank​ you​ so​ much.​ Nice​ enveronment​ with​ delicious food​ for​ perfect​ dinner.​ We​ can​ fun​ with​ our friend​ in​ this​ area all​ the​ time.​Thank​ You​ to​ k.Anan and​ k.fern for​ very​ best​ service
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Capella has given us really one of a kind of experience that is truly memorable. It's not just a "high standard hotel" but it aims to personalize the service and give you the best experience you could ever have when staying away from home. The attention to detail is unbelievable and the fact that all staffs are so friendly and care so much to know your feedback in all activities and service you are using is incredible. The food is so great but in Phra Nakorn and Cote. The room has a splendid view of the river and the bedding is just super comfortable. Also you will be very surprise that you have unlimited "Acqua Panna" to drink the entire stay !!!! Well, what else can I say.... I will definitely spend my time there again.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: We were impressed with The Capella Bangkok from the very first moment we stepped out of the car. Yes the hotel rate is perhaps the most expensive in Bangkok at the moment but the experience we received is worth every penny and much more. I honestly don't think it even covers the cost. The view from every room is stunning. The layout is impressive. We can walk the room in loop. It also has an outdoor terrace to enjoy the view. The best thing about the Capella is the services. The staffs warmly greeted us  with nickname. They researched about the guests and carefully designed how to personally take care of us every step of the way.  Our culturist was Khun Mick, who was always there for everything. There are a few activities offered daily. We joined Cin-cin hours by Cote and by Stella Bar which were superb. I must mention Khun Nook at Stella bar who offered to show the bar even when it was closed due to Covid19 restriction. We also enjoyed the pool and poolside Pinto meals as we were entertained by Khun Namnow and Khun Toey. They were so much fun to be with. I attended a private yoga class by Khun Milk who was highly professional and very sweet. We also used the vitality pool bcause Khun AubAib tempted us and arranged everything for us. As for meals, we loved Phra Nakhon so much, even more the Cote. Thai food there is the best in Thailand by far! Breakfast is served at Phra Nakhon by the river and we also went there for dinner. One cannot afford to miss Phra Nakhon while in the area. All in all, every inch of the hotel itself is spotlessly beautiful with genuine care. No plastic was used even for amenities.  We were treated like princesses every minute for 36 hours of our stay. Never wanted to leave.  A truly priceless experience. Kudos to the Capella Bangkok team for such efforts you made to personalize a memorable time for every guest. Definitely number one in my heart.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: My friend had told me about the cappella hotel in Singapore,so when it opened in Bangkok i thought i would give it a try.We booked valentine weekend which also was our 25th wedding anniversary.when we arrived we had lovely flowers in the room and a bottle of wine for our wedding anniversary.the room we had was one of the main rooms and had big balcony overlooking the river, the view is fabulous and the room very big and very luxurious.we went to the pool and chilled outfits not  big pool but the hotel isn't big either, so plenty of loungers to sit on.we went to the Thai restaurant that night and the food and ambience, as right by the riverside, was also fantastic.we had a massage the following day and also i used the steam room there which i really liked.their are a few different rooms/villas but i think the basic room is easily perfect.we had a wonderful time and to be honest i didn't want to leave!!we will go back for sure, great place for a staycation!!!
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: We enjoyed staying at the Suite room at the Valentine Day and Chinese New Year season.  All the guests were invited one of the activities by Cote and Stella to the executive villa in this case.  It was one of memorable activities at the romantic sun set time.  At the Cote restaurant, the special Valentine’s  Day dinner course is served by the chef, Mauro.  He is the specialist for sea food.  At the Auriga spa, we could book the vitality pool in private use.  At breakfast, the staff remembers our favorite juice and served it before ordering.  Wherever recalling our stay, we feel happy again.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: My family was pleasantly surprised with Capella and we had a fantastic weekend spent at this hotel. I was initially skeptical because my husband chose "another city hotel" for a staycation. However, from the moment we stepped out of the car upon arrival until the moment we departed, we were welcomed and treated very decently.  Some other 5-stars' hotels are snobbish to guests doing staycations, but we did not experience this at all during our stay.  What we experienced was the sincerity, warmth & friendliness of all staff, from the Concierge, FO, Culturists, Housekeeping, F&B outlets' Phra Nakorn, Cote & in-room dining, even the gardeners and guards, that made our experience quite memorable. We felt that every staff gave their full "customer service from the heart," going above & beyond to fulfill guest's requests (within reason, of course).  Also, meeting Khun Ted and Khun KJ at all times was a nice gesture of management being accessible and available to all guests. The Verandah guest room was excellent, very clean, having well-stocked amenities and mini-bar. It was nice to relax beside the private plunge pool and eat our meals on the terrace. Give Capella Bangkok a try and you will not be disappointed.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: We stayed here for 1 night and it was our first stay. I must admit that Capella Bangkok is the best hotel on the Chao Phraya River I have ever experienced.With a warm welcome and fast procedure, the room was beautiful. The view of the Chao Phraya River is beautifully seen. And we don't miss out on paying extra to upgrade to Verandah room.For a restaurant in Phra Nakhon, the service was excellent, the food was delicious with a beautiful sunset view, and at Cote, although we missed a good seat, despite the request in advance, Khun Thibaud took very good care of us, making it a wonderful meal. Delicious food, good ingredients, and excellent service staff.Cin Cin Hour is the main selling point here. Stella Team by Khun Niza took great care of us. More than that The management team took care and greeted the guests closely, especially Mr.John and Ted, who are professional and attentive to every detail and have a typical Thai humility. From my first stay experience, I am sure it was the right decision that I had made a second reservation since I have never stayed.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Perfect place to stay! The hotel design was very beautiful. Wonderful view with Chaophaya river.  The hospitality was very impressive. Room is very functional, clean, and tidy. Room service was also impressive.The Breakfast with views over the river combined with great service and food is unforgettable! Thank you and see you soon!
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: From the moment we got to the hotel until we left the service you get here is sensational. We stayed in a riverfront room including balcony and it was just perfect and all the amenities are wonderful- love they have Aesop brand hereThere is a point of difference no matter where you go in the hotel, I would highly recommend you stay here you will not be disappointed Make sure you try Cote restaurant it’s a mustFor breakfast definitely try the unagi Benedict and the shibuya toast but a big bonus is the coffee- finally a hotel that gets coffee culture and not just run of the mill percolated coffeeOne recommendation would be to make the pool a bit warmer as it was extremely coldJohn the general manager is phenomenal and all his staff will make you stay unforgettable- I didn’t want to leave
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I came to have Afternoon tea and got a fantastic experience for the first time, everything was good, the staff was nice especially chef Ann, she is very professional recommends the food which she made. Very recommend!
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I visit Capella Bangkok for the first time and impress with good taste of Bakery here so delicious. Chef Ann is professional and has knowledge. I and my friends will come back again soon for sure.With love ^^
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I had recently stay here for the Valentine’s Day weekend. I have to say that I was impressed. Every staffs goes if of their way to take care of all my needs; whether it be restaurants booking or something else. The room also comes with complimentary/refillable non alcoholic mini bar. You can drink all the cokes and Aqua Panna you want Other than great room and excellent services, the room service food taste equally as good. I love the Soft Shell Crab Pad Thai and variety of fruit sorbet in the room service Menu. Breakfast buffet is another aspect of this hotel that I love, a lot of items to choose from; my personal favourite are unagi egg Benedict and boiled rice with fish. I also recommend booking Côte ahead and order the 9 courses inspirational menu. It is worth the wait. I would definitely recommend staying here. In fact I loved it so much that I had already booked my next stay. Until then!
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Looking for a private and super comfortable stay in Bangkok with Chao Praya view? Capella will give you everything you need. All of the rooms can give you the most beautiful sunset (and sunrise) along with the lively routine of Chao Praya river. The staffs here are friendly, professional, helpful  and ready to make your stay rises above your expectation. The place is well-maintained and well designed. Just come and experience it yourself.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I spent only one night at villa. This villa is very well decorated and the space is perfectly fit for 5-6 people having a little party. When we arrived there are one plate of cheese and cold cut and one plate of various fruits. The hotel staffs are very impressive. I had a dinner at Cote with course menu. This restaurant might be one of the best restaurant in Bangkok. When the pandemic subside and the situation back to normal again, I strongly recommend this hotel for someone who looking for the best experience in Bangkok.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I would highly recommend this hotel for your stay in Bangkok. The view of the Chao Phraya river is very remarkable. Every staff members here always ensure the excellent service to their guests. The room is excellent. The food from every outlet in the hotel is very delicious.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I saw the promotion with 90 mins SPA treatment yesterday and I’m calling the hotel right away for my treatment today :)The atmosphere is very nice, well decorated, very quiet and peaceful :) and yet very NEWWarm welcome from the staff named BUA, she introduced me the signature 4 scents of treatment oil, which I selected “Narn” scent Then P’NUI (my therapist) show me the spa room that very spacious, love the warm stone bed and everything :)the spa session went well, very smooth, calm and very relaxing ! and yes I’m definitely coming back here again :))))
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: stunning panoramic river view from roomultra luxury detail decorative and lighting designsuper clean roomvery nice staffyummy dessert and foodhigh privacygood locationvery reccomend for everyone
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: This hotel opened recently last Oct (2020). Room is big enough an well decorated. Bath room is wondeful with the see thru view. Window glasses in room are high and see thru chao phra ya river view from bed. You will never wanna go out from room because of the infinite river view. Swimming pool is beautiful, all pool has marble so water is very cold. Virtuality pool in Spa is not missed. Very relaxation. This place is perfect for staycation.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Too good to be true. This hotel is one of the best, location staff quality and all you can ask for from one place. The best place for staycation in Bangkok. Breafast line is totally worth trying, unagi is great, salmon as well.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Wonderful stay experienced so far in Bangkok.Especially the excellent service service quality from the team.Thanks for Khun Oil and Khun Ryan.I would like to Strong recommend for urban leisure.Overall ,considering the property and service quality ,I believe that Capella Bangkok almost the Top 1 of all High-so hotel in Bangkok area
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Excellent! Seamless experience throughout from every delightful staff interaction, food & beverage quality and to the state of the art hotel features, loved every second of it. But what we are most impressed with is our Culturist Pam. We were amazed, astonished, simply surprised by one her of generous acts. Pam was aware that we were watching a special sporting match one morning. She took it upon herself to surprise us with complimentary snacks and drinks along with a hand written note. We could not believe this gesture which surely made this moment a memory we will never forget. I would recommend Capela Bangkok solely based on their customer service, everything else is just icing on the cake.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I had the opportunity to stay at Capella Bangkok during Chinese New Year. My rate include breakfast and an upgrade to Riverfront Premier room. Since the hotel isn't yet known to most people and I don't want to spend time explaining to Grab drivers, I decided to booked limousine service from the hotel, which is a very comfortable Mercedes S Class filled with goodies and drinks. When arrived, I was greeted by name and escorted to Living Room to process check-in just few moments later I was shown to the room. The room itself is spacious and with large windows it makes the room feel airy as well. The non-alcoholic minibar is complimentary and they will refill it upon your request. They provide a tablet for you to send service requests which I find to be very convenient compare to other hotels that I have to call for every single thing. The service here is one of the best I have received so far, very responsive and easily handle all of my requests.The facilities and activities here are extensive so make sure to find time to participate especially Cin Can hours where they'll have drinks and snacks served as well as an opportunity to talk with other guests and staffs.The breakfast right now is not buffet but you can order as much as you want. Maybe during my stay the hotel is having more guests than usual, some items ordered are not available (not just breakfast but also during lunch as well) Try get a riverside seating if you can, it is absolutely wonderful!
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: We stayed 1 night for Chinese New Year. It was amazing since check in. Verandah Suite was magnificent. Located directly on Chao Phraya River with sunset view. The hotel is on the luxury side where all amenities in room were provided at the best suited to the brand and standards. The Spa and Vitality Pool were just out of the world experience. After 3 hours my partner and I feel younger. One of the best we visited. The team on the ground were amazing, friendly and makes you feel at home. GM has a great sense of humor, humble and professional. Great asset to Bangkok! Well done .... can’t wait to try other Capellas....
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Stepped into Bangkok’s latest ultra-luxurious hotel, our experience was beyond words. We were checked into the hotel’s signature room called “the veranda” , and were so thrill with the balcony, along with outdoor jet plunge pool, overlooking the mejestic river of Kings. One of the highlights of capella is “living room” where all in house guests are welcome to lounge in and enjoy a glass of champagne during the stay. Thank you Khun Pack and khun Ball, who took great care of us during our vacationing. Thumb ups for the male therapist at the spa. I felt much rejuvenated after the treatment was done. Lastly I would like thank hotel’s GM who graciously welcomed me at the check in.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Impressive. First of all, Very much thanks to Khun’Tai, the spa receptionist, for the warm welcome and outstanding services from her. Everything is 10/10. World-class experiences. The afternoon tea was also amazing and also not pricey, especially the scone with pineapple jam. Recommend this place to everyone and hope to visit this place again soon!
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Hotel is very nice and wonderful experience. Auriga Wellness and Spa is perfect treatment by Khun Dan (Therapist) and all spa team. Phra Nakorn Thai Restaurant is great service and good taste. Khun Nun (Asst. Restaurant Manager) is very good service and warm welcome. Khun Champion is also nice and perfect for property introduction.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Excellence hotel. Lovely service-minded staff. Good decorated hotel with stunning view of Chao Praya River via your room’s window. Great Amenities. Excellence breakfast and there is no time to Check in and Check out. All of staff can recognized your name. There is your own culturist( Butler).
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: This Hotel Definitely One of the best hotel in Bangkok .The breathtaking panoramic river view from the room will delight your stay. The standard room is as large as the suite type in other hotels. The Decoration inside the room is luxury and amenities are all Hi end Brand (also plastic free) The Staffs Especially K.Luck are very kind ,professional and full of service mind. The Services are very impressive Beyond My expectation.I am looking forward to visit Capella again soon
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: This is our 3rd visit for this hotelThe room was nicely decorated and designed. All the furniture and tablewares are designed brand and high end. The service was EXTREMELY IMPRESSIVE. I honestly can say that this hotel is ONE OF THE BEST LUXURY HOTEL in Bangkok.I’ve stayed at Mandarin Oriental, Rosewood, Waldorf and others but there is no place else like this one.(I would rank Capella as same tier as Mandarin Oriental) The staffs were super attentive. most of the staffs from hotel seem to acknowledge every hotel guests (since my first visit I went to the pool and fitness somehow the staffs seem to know my name, that very surprised me) staffs here work hard to find out guests’s preferences to make sure guest’s satisfication. i got super tiny cuts by broken glasses and Khun Ice immediately appear at my door steps with first aid kits ( Eventhough i insist that’s not necessary) Khun Champ and Khun Mick both were really there to make sure my family and I got everything I need. they even set up the kids tents for my niece in room to enjoyed and send her treats while all the grown up are dining at restaurant ( for cote kids should be older than 5 years old ) The restaurant there is a MUST both especially for COTE. I bet they will be received Michelin star soon. Chef Davide is very talented. The food was exquisite. I’ve been to MIRAZUR in French and I can assure you that COTE is carry the similar style and standard from there. I’m the type of person who like to visit the same place over and over to make sure it’s standard before shout out the recommendation. All I could say is this place is one of my favourite restaurant in Bangkok. Khun Thibaud (restaurant manager) and especially Khun Sutut both them are excellent both service skill and food knowledge. Khun Sutut can deliver the value of dishes from chef and story of each dish perfectly.The Pranakorn (Thai restaurant) is very tasty, it’s actually very Thai original style with little twist (for some menu) It’s also highly recommendedWe tried many room typesriver front premier room type - the panoramic view of Chao playa river is highlight of this roomThe veranda - is very nice for bangkok escaping with own plunge poolThe villa is one of best memorable time there . If you want your peace in Bangkok there is your escape. Even though I’ve been to the hotel 3 times already since it’s open last oct and I still want to revisit the hotel.Ps. This is none sponsored post. All the expenses are from our pocket.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: 5 Luxury hotel & resort in Bangkok Nice roomService mind Good view Food delicious Lovely staffAfternoon tea with live guitar player Sunset at the riverfront Fill like resort and privacy Wonderful art piece
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Enjoy spending time on my staycation. Receiving such impressive experience during stay at Capella. Appreciated everything and get very warm welcome from GM (Khun John Blanco) and all staffs. Pra Nakhon restaurant is authentic Thai cusine located on the bank of Chaopraya river. I love boneless seabass dish very much. Everything at Capella is the best. I will back to stay Capella Bangkok soon.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Had a great Thai meal at Capella during an extended work trip to Bangkok. The newly opened hotel has a great cool vibe and despite being recently opened the service is already assured and professional right from the moment you are greeted at the impressive entrance. The Thai food nicely blends street style with high end cooking and presentation - too many highlights to mention! The location by the river is also great. Definitely worth a visit.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: We highly recommend to stay this hotel. All staffs are so gentle and kind . Hotel Facility is very sophisticated and well organized . I think this hotel is the best hotel in Bangkok in services and facility.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: We had a night staycation at Capella to celebrate a birthday.  We were given a fabulous surprise menu from Côte - seriously the best meal we have had ever! Wow. In terms of the hotel, it is beautifully designed, and practical too. The service, in my view, is Capella’s trump card. Given the Covid restrictions from the government that kept updating, which the hotel had to adhere to, they have made the celebration possible.  In fact, it was more memorable than it would have been in a normal situation where issue has been turned an opportunity.  Capella has created beautiful memories for us which we will never forget, and we would be happy coming back here any day. Thank you to the Capella team for our fabulous stay. A fantastic team of people such as you all can achieve anything. Best wishes from our family.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: We were there for New Year celebration. View from the room was breathtaking. Everything was in good condition and clean. Staffs were mostly very attentive and friendly except someone we met during breakfast that was a bit rude. There was a bit of miscommunication about time we could use swimming pool. They responded and resolved the problem promptly.The overall stay is memorable. The sevice still has some flaws, based on hotel tier and our expectation. Time will tell whether they could improve this to perfection
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: It is the best hotel for every occasion. Staffs are super supportive, by far the best staff ever from my experience. Facilities are finest. It is one of the best wellness centre in Bangkok. If you looking for watching new year’s fireworks show, here is the place. I recommend to watch from room’s balcony.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: A big thank you to John, Ted, Pack and all the staff for a wonderful staycation. We felt like we were being welcomed home. Hotel is super chic and elegant. Food was exceptional; in fact we’d have to say that our room service was probably the best room service food we’ve ever had. We had a great view of the fireworks from our balcony for Loy Krathong. Highly recommended
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: A very nice hotel with perfect rooms and high qualty everything. During our two nights stay at the Capella Hotel in Bangkok we had the chance of a private. We were impressed and I am sure that we will be repeating costumers.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: This hotel is a gem. Everything was close to perfection. The staff were very friendly and kind from the start. The room was immaculate and well designed. It felt like an escape from noisy Bangkok which was a good thing. Perfect for a staycation. I really enjoyed all the food and the cocktail and dessert omakase. I hope to be back one day.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I and my wife celebrated our 2nd wedding anniversary at Capella Bangkok.- As hotel have flexible check-in and check-out (up to 36 hours stay), so we spent almost 36 hours in hotel. Check-in at 10am in morning, and check-out 10pm in next day evening, gave us wonderful time relaxing in hotel.- All hotel staffs are very nice and take caring us very well.- View of river from room was very impressive.We will visit Capella Bangkok again in the near future.Thank you for the hospitality during our stay.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I feel like I am relaxing in a resort. Everything was prepared with meticulousness and naturalness. I can hardly find any fault. Decoration, Facilities, Amenity, F&B and Service almost are perfect.Especially I love their Afternoon tea which I feel indifferent everywhere I have eaten except here.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: A true gem, in the heart of the busiest city in the world - a peace heaven where the genuine team gives the very best service. We have been so lucky to stay here as the resort opened only a few weeks ago. Looking at the service level they are providing now already, I can't wait to see what they'll be doing with more time in the near future!
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Excellent property with panoramic views of Chao Praya River. Well appointed room and great facilities. Service is very personal and outstanding. Every staffs greeted you by your name. Amazing attention to detail. Capella Bangkok is now our most favorite hotel in Thailand :)
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Excellent facility and hospitality. The swimming pool has great view of Chaoprya river. Food is really delicious and stylish. I love suckling pig dish from Cote' restuarant. The hotel also provide fun activities during our stay. My friend and I really enjoy bike trip from hotel culturist. This bike trip is a couple hours long but very interesting.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Luxurious comfort with exceptional hospitality.  Our staycation with Capella Bangkok is truly an awesome experience. Right before our arrival we enjoyed planing cultural activities with hotel culturist, Khun Oil, who ensured that we all get the best experience during our stay. The one road two wheels biking tour with Co Van Kessel is packed with local knowledge and dedicated guides. We definitely treasure our time here and can not wait to visit the hotel again in the future.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Stunning design with impressive and flawless service. The view of Chao Phraya river from the room is truly amazing. Our kids enjoyed the pool very much. Very family friendly hotel with the world class hospitality.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: This hotel is unlike any other hotels out there. It makes you feel like home. I feel invested in this hotel because my engagement and wedding ceremonies were held here and we had the chance to walk around the property since it's not finished yet. The ceremonies were as lovely as I imagined. The staff clearly has the high level of service mind. The food was so delicious that a lot of guests still talked about it even days after the ceremonies. Most importantly, our wedding cake was the most beautiful cake we had ever seen (super delicious). A lot of thanks go to Khun Kaew who'd been with us since the first day and helped making our dream wedding happened. Can't wait to go back again!
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: The decoration is superb and very well-designed. Thai food at Pranakorn is the real authentic. I recommend sharing lunch set for 2 and Unagi Benedict for the breakfast. However I did not  experience the other hotel activity except Fitness room.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Everything is beyond our expectation. The hotel is really beautiful and well designed. All staffs are very friendly and helpful. Food is great. Room is very comfortable. Sleep quality is excellent. The view from the hotel is really great. Our family really had a great time. We’ll definitely stay there again.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Perfect room, full river view, excellent service and authentic Thai food, highly recommended. Capella certainly delivers both outstanding accommodation and service, including a generous breakfast by the river.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I have been waiting for grand opening of Capella Bangkok.  Our stay was much more satisfactory than I expected. All the staffs have mind of hospitality, and the cuisine at the restaurant is high leveled.  When I met and chatted with General Manager after breakfast for a few minutes, I was convinced Capella Bangkok is a superb hotel, because his good looking personality tells us his good character. That’s why all the staffs are kind.   On the other hand, accommodation, furniture and mattress are also supreme and gorgeous.  I am looking forward to visiting Capella Bangkok again.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Capello Bangkok has just opened the door on 1 October. I am waiting for this for a very long time due to delayed opening. Situated at the Charoenkrung area which is a historical street in Bangkok near Chaophraya river, the hotel incorporates everything about the way of life near Chaophraya river to the hotel decoration and concept.I stayed at Verandah room with huge jaguzzi plunge pool facing Chaophraya river. The room was gorgeously decorated, luxurious style. The bathroom was huge and nicely designed.I really love the bathroom amenity.The light of the room was not too dark which was very good. The living room of the hotel was the place we could sit back, relax and enjoy seeing the view of the river of life.The Capella Culturist who took care of me Khun “Mick” is the best. He showed and explained me every details of the hotels including the design, the sculptures, the art in the lobby. He managed to book restaurants for me and my family in spite of the nearly booked seats.The breakfast and lunch at Phranakorn restaurant was really good. Don’t forget to try Unagi Benedict and Shibuya honey toast for breakfast.Dinner at Cote was also fantastic. I tried Carte Blanche menu which Chef Davide perfectly cooked every dish for me. I really felt like “home” here and will be back again to stay at this luxurious hotel. Highly recommended for everyone.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I had the most memorable engagement day at Capella Bangkok on Sep 28. Back in Jan 2020 after seeing many topnotch venues/hotels around BKK, it was love at first sight when we paid our 1st visit. It took only a few minutes to surely know that nowhere else it'd rather be. We would make memories of families, friends and loved ones right here.Perfect location - CHECKED - what else you could ask for the best view of BKK besides the iconic Chaopraya riverFood - CHECKED - amazing presentation and taste Service - CHECKED - the most heartfelt and helpful service by the whole team especially  Khun Phendao (catering sales mgr.) who had been with us since day 1. We never thank you ENOUGH.Honestly, this is my first ever review on Tripadvisor and I admit that I just register just to specifically do this review. I want this review not only to be useful for those who are looking for memorable experience in Bangkok as travellers or even locals but also to sincerely praise to the great team at Capella Bangkok.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Best hotel in Bangkok hands down and would highly recommend. The restaurants, to the world-class bar and the friendliness of the staff make this place very special. The location on the water in an historic part of Bangkok is very nice too.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Nice atmosphere with great delicacies. Chef Ann creates amazing desserts and takes great care of us. Their clotted cream and jam are homemade and superb. Definitely worth the price, must-try afternoon tea. Surely is one of the best in Bangkok.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: I had the first staycation at here on Nov 2020 and don't hesitate to go back. I went to Capella again on Jan 2021 and plan the third time on April!The reason that i love here is they are the best in many things, room, dinning and amenities.I started to try here because I heard that Capella would like to be the best in Bangkok. Yes! They are worth it.The first time is the best but second time they can do better:)Especially thank one of your team Mr.Ted.Anyway just a bit comment about my this time culturist, she is good but dont smile much:)
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Pleasant staycation with friendly and supportive staffs. Breakfast selection was great and had great time at the spa. Facilities are brand new and well maintain. We got upgraded to an amazing room with nice view. Cote and Stella were  amazing. Recommend!
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: After its opening last year, I always had an eyes on staying here. Finally I had a chance to stay at Capella Bangkok. I would say staycation more than 24 hours here was beyond my expectation. Hotel facilities and design were good however what made this place so special were attentive staffs. From culturist/check in staffs who can literally remember our names. Our favorite staffs were at pool as they could really remember our names the other days as I believed there were so many guests visiting the pool. Cote was the best and became my top 3 favorite in Bangkok. Staffs were brilliant as well. The only down side, but not so disturbing, was the misspelling of my name on welcoming letter, as I believed Thai name may be quite difficult sometimes. The room was spacious and very well equipped. Balcony really made for such chilled out, even in this super hot weather. Writing this long, I would say I highly recommended this hotel for anyone's stay or staycation in Bangkok.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel

User Reviews: Best hotel in Bangkok hands down and would highly recommend. The restaurants, to the world-class bar and the friendliness of the staff make this place very special. The location on the water in an historic part of Bangkok is very nice too.
Name: Capella Bangkok Hotel
