User Reviews: We stayed here on our first night in Bangkok and it was disappointing, the staff were not at all friendly not once did anyone even say hello.The people at the reception desk were not a bit friendly and could only speak a little English and communication was a joke.Room was ok but we couldn’t get out of here fast enough.Check out is 12 and the power to our room was cut off right on 12.Give this place a big miss!!
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: Decent place to stay.  Rooms fine.  Breakfast good.  Rooftop pool comfatable. Nice Thai restaurant in alleyway next to hotel.  VG cheap Night market out to your right on Main Street and  then right again - in total about 10 minutes away. Close subway  station if that is your thing.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: After a long flight arrived at hotel at 8.00 only to be told to come back at 2.00 pm , asked to use the toilet in reception it was disgusting after going for a bite to eat & finding the bank went back & waited in the reception which as also grubby with water from the air-conditioning running down the walls on to one of the sofa's. Got to out room it was ok nothing like the picture on the website, holes in the sheets & towels and water running down the walls on to the sofa in the room so couldn't sit on it, breakfast was awful the staff were very rude & the language barrier didn't help either, really glad we only stayed 3 nights would only give it 2 star maximum and that's being generous
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: I had a pleasant stay at I residence Silom. They welconed me with cool drinks and bites. The check in staff were so helpful and courteous. They attended to my queries promptly.kudos to you and to I residence hotel.. will surely stay again.

The "Do Not Disturb" button is not working and the toilet door badly designs. The hotel counter can't help you if you want to change money to smaller notes. To be honest, I am very disappointed. User Reviews: Great hotel and great value and clean. Loved the pool and friendly staff. The pool deck was relaxing and nice music. The breakfast buffet was nice and had lots of wonderful food options. I would for sure stay here again
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: I’ve been looking for a decent place stay for one in Bangkok, on the way to Hong Kong, and since I like the Silom area, I decided to give a try to this establishment. As most of the reviewers wrote, location is just excellent, right next to BTS Chong Nonsi. Check in was quick and easy, staff were helpful and smiling. Rooms were spacious, but basic, definitely not up to 4 star rating. The whole place is a mixed bag: good sized rooms, good staff, perfect location versus disorganized breakfast (empty food containers on the table), messy, uncleared areas...
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: This hotel has great location. Is right in front of Chang Nonsi skytrain station, across the street from King Power Maha high rise building and surrounded by restaurants, street food and cafes.The pool at the 10th floor is a great addition. Is not too big but it has a nice view and is perfect for when you want to cool off after spending few hours walking the streets of hot and humid Bangkok.The room we had was clean and big enough. I liked that the AC was not blowing directly over the bed so we could sleep with it on.Now to the negatives: breakfast is terrible. Plenty of Asian choices, but if you are not into rice and noodles for breakfast, you are pretty much left with eggs, bread, jam and butter. One day would not be terrible, but if you stay longer and like Western breakfast, consider other places for the first meal of the day.Service is terrible! Reception speaks very little to no English, and the concierge gives bad or wrong advices.Their prices for laundry are ridiculous (70 USD for 3 kg of T-shirts, underwear, pants...), so we asked for cheaper alternatives. The concierge recommended us another hotel. We carried our things there and...surprise: that hotel had always accepted laundry from their guests only. Back to I Residence, I told the concierge he gave us a bad advice and he barely acknowledged it, let alone apologize.All in all, is an OKish hotel. Just have breakfast somewhere else and ask Google, instead of the staff, for any advice you need.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: Placed near the silom night Market and metro. Nice for couples. I would always come back to bangkok and stay here. I like that you can reach to the airport fast also. The staff is very friendly. Also the breakfast is delightful.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: Had a great stay at this hotel. Pool on the roof and amazing breakfast. The rooms are clean with a nice view. Location is good. 5 minutes from the center. Close to the sky train station which is convenient. Would stay again if i come back
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: Very good hotel and friendly stuff... The Hotel is Clean everywhere.The Pool ist very very nice and sou have a good View from it. The hotel is in a very good Location to enjoy the full Bangkok Feeling.

User Reviews: I just loved staying here, i stayed a total of 15 days which is unusual for me as im a traveler and spend most of my time traveling. Unfortunately, i was not able to give the hotel five stars for two issues which i really think they should correct... One, the room has no dark shades to prevent light from coming in. Second, the noise from the busy street and train station clearly comes in (we were on the 8th floor).On the positive side everything else is perfect including the lobby receptionists, the door men, both night and day were so delightful to come and see each time we returned from a long day of sightseeing, the morning car porter was also someone i looked forward in seeing every morning as he always wanted to talk to us (super friendly), the cleaning lady always did a great job even when we didn't activate our "make the room" light notification and finally the lady Kob that works with the booking of tours was so friendly even thou we didn't purchase any tours with her.....Thank you all for my wonderful 15 days of stay!!

User Reviews: This hotel is awesome and chich.we came in the middle of the night and Chaya at the front desk was so helpful even if we were so loud and noisy at the check in counter.the rooms are great and it looks clean

User Reviews: Excellent check in service, Chaya at the front desk was very helpful during our late night check in. The taxi found it easily and the bellman got all our bags quickly. I'm pretty sleepy and can't wait to see the room! It comes with free breakfast
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: What I love in this hotel:Just below BTS (Chong Nonsi Station)Affordable - below 3k per night for a spacious room with buffet breakfast for 2.Breakfast buffet has many choices - from rice meals, to noodles and pasta, fruits, salad bar, omelet being cooked upon order, all kinds of bread and spreads (orange marmalade is present!), they also have ham, pork, chicken, siopao, soup/porriage and cereals for kids (I eat lots of koko krunch). Of course coffee, tea, hot choco, were present too. just don’t like much the waffle it was not fluffy.Housekeeping - they replace towels everydayStaff - very accomodating and polite. I saw a review that staff there are rude, but in my experience, it’s not true. Even the bell boy was funny and entertaining. I also appreciate the receptionist who assisted me during check in, she talked slowly like she’s ensuring I understand her. Thai people I encouter were a little bit hard to understand because of their accent in speaking in english. I appreciate the receptionist while talking to me. I just forgot what was her name :(Power plugs are everywhere - i don’t need to bring extension cords to charge all my devices all at the same time.Wifi connection is fast. Forgot to check the mbps though.They have hair dryer and mini ref.What i don’t like was, just the waffle on the breakfast buffet, no dresser and slippers. These are all manageable and can easily be fixed. I bought my own slippers and used the toilet mirror.Surely I will return to this hotel when I return to Thailand again.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: The pool was very nice with a great view of the tallest building in Bangkok and you can see all those people walking out onto the glass floor at the top of the building (eeks) - pool was a bit cool for me but still a great cool down at end of day.However, that is where it stops. The breakfast buffet, while it looked not bad, was cold every morning which I found very odd considering we were the first ones there every day - buffet staff were disinterested; resorted to the omelette bar to get something hot; fruit looked like the day before’s on a couple morns.Rooms definitely don’t look like the website; shower was cold or luke warm at best and could hear the guy snoring in the next room. The hallway rugs don’t look like they have seen a shampooing for a while.Bellmen were very helpful and always pleasant. Some good restaurants in the area and within walking distance to the night market and the interesting sights around thereYes they are doing renovations so that may help in the future.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: I arrive at hotel very late, 1am,after a long journey it was good to see that reception was still open, I was pleasently greeted a friendly face Chaya who processed me fast and efficiently and got me to my room as quickly as possible . cheers Dorrie
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: Landed around 3am-ish but the reception was able to find us a room which is great. Also, the next day we were upgraded to a bigger room just by playing their game roulette, the lady at the reception Thanh is very kind to accomodate us with a lovely smile. Location just a few steps from bts chong nonsi, 7/11, and lots of places to eat nearby. Breakfast has a wide spread, different servings everyday. I won't hesitate to book again when i go back to bangkok.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: The room was nice and all the facilities as well (the gym is really small but we did not used it so it was ok). It is really close to the BTS station and many 7Eleven and other stores. For us the best part was the infinity pool right in front of the Mahanakhon. The cocktails by the pool were nice too. The staff always tried to help us and provived a breakfast box since we were leaving early in the morning. We would Stay there again.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: I am staying here for 2 nights and this place impressed me a lot. It is certainly worth the money plus the room is very big for this cost. We can reserve the parking space in advance through the booking process to get the spot right under the building. The location is brilliant, next to Chongnonsi BTS station just only 5 mins walking distance, thumbs up!!! Will definitely stay here again in the future.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: We arrived at 4am but the staff, Ahaya accommodated us by looking for a nice room for us to early check in. The room is clean, equipped with all essential amenities. Their breakfast is worth the price as there are various food offerings that you can choose from not to mention the very friendly and courteous staff that are always ready to help you.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: The hotel is very near to ChongNonSi train station, like 1 minute. So meaning, this hotel is very convenient to all. This is the 2nd time here and still wanting to book here everytime I will have holiday in Bangkok. I like this hotel from the very friendly and accommodating staff to the breakfast food. This is very awesome hotel to check-in.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: I usually do not write bad reviews but for the sake of others, I just had to.The name of the hotel is i Residence but booking this location for my stay with my significant other in Bangkok was something that I regret. In fact, this was the only hotel in all my years of travel that made me check out soon after checking in.When we reached the lobby of i Residence, located in the basement next to the carpark, I didn't know what to expect. Checking in was a breeze and we were given a pair of keycards. Unknown to us, this was the beginning of our problematic stay here, as we had been given the old "insert in" keycards despite the suite door being installed with the new tap-only lock system. Due to this, we had to take the elevator back down and be re-issued new keycards which the counter staff failed to program correctly. As such, we had to go up to to the room's floor and down back to the lobby thrice before we even got to enter the room.The room was rather dank with cracked floors, a stained sofa and a double bed which was actually 2 twin beds sharing a large bedsheet with a depression in the middle due to bad alignment. We took comfort in the fact that the location was close to the city but made a mental note that the price we paid could have gotten better lodging. As we lay on the bed watching the decent selection of television channels, we started to feel itchy and uncomfortable. It was only then that I realised that that despite me killing 4 bugs in the first 30 minutes of entering the room, the number of bugs lurking around had barely decreased.Out of nowhere, a hotel staff burst into the room after a barely audible knock, declaring that our room was due for checkout. Funny how this had happened given that we had just checked in less than 1 hour ago and he was the same guy that had assisted us in opening the room door due to the previously mentioned keycard fiasco. As sudden as his entry, he muttered an apology saying that he got the wrong room number and rushed out without even closing the door, leaving us stunned and appalled at what had just happened.My significant other and myself looked at each other at disbelief with regard to our overall experience at i Residence thus far. As we started to discuss, we noticed another bug flying casually across us and decided that was it. We repacked our belongings and went down to check out immediately, letting the counter staff know what had happened, to which we were met with indifference. As such, I am lead to believe that incidents like these are not uncommon at this hotel.To those who have booked or are planning to book this as your place to stay, best you think again on whether you are willing to sacrifice privacy, hygiene, and comfort  just for slightly better access to prime locations in Silom.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: Such a pleasent stay and convenience the hotel situated right infront chong nong si bts train. Easy to commute around city. The hotel need to upgrade on the soundproof other than that the service and the amanities all provided according to the customer need. The breakfast is super good. Value for what I pay.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: Very convenient from the bts station and the stuffs are very friendly.Checking in is easy ;)There is a 711 at the outside which made life so much easy.Also welcome drink for those who travel long day, felt so welcome the moment I step in here.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: Very good and nice hotel to stay. Recommend to stay during this period also have lucky draw too. You feel like home and nice service, nice reception service too. Also free breakfast too. You can enjoy your trip
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: The girls on receiption are v nice and greet the customers with smiling face The location is great Miss Chayapha and Miss Fong are special for treatment to the customers. Breakfast is good room service good
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: Nice hotel and staff. Only problem with TV channels.  No English speaking channels.  Asked to retune tv, but still no UK news. But would stay again.  Nice pool and fantastic breakfast.  Fantastic location for gay scene.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: We stayed in this hotel for 4 nights. The first day when we checked in we were put next to the renovated room but the smell of chemicals was unbearable so we requested to move to another room and the hotel staff did it promptly. The room quality here is good especially compare to the price, the room is spacious and quite clean, the bed is very comfortable and the toiletries are not that bad. The breakfast is quite nice with variety of options though they seem to be the same everyday. The best thing about this hotel is its location! It locates right by the BTS and in the center of Bangkok. We would stay there again.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: Very professional staff, I asked for a quiet room and got an excellent, big and quiet room.The location is excellent since it is next to the BTS station Chong Nonsi and 12 min of walk to Sala Daeng. Good restaurants nearby.So if you are staying for business or leisure this hotel is perfect, especially for that price.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: Pros:Location: Just beside Chong Nonsi BTS (Skytrain system in Bangkok)Facilities: Swimming pool at the 10th floor with a view of urban Bangkok, Breakfast served with multiple selectionsRoom: Clean and comfortableRoom equipment: TV, Hair dryer, fridge (not the mini type)Others: McDonald's, Boots, 7-11, street vendors, local dishes beside the hotel, can leave luggage with concierge for those with late flight.Cons:There is no DVD player and it is not available when requested at front desk even though the hotel guide mentioned that guest can request for it.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: I have stayed 2 pervious times at the I Resident Hotel Silom, and am back now for my 3rd stay in seven months.  Very close to the BTS, buffet breakfast can be included, great WiFi, and the staff is wonderful, friendly and helpful.  Will definitely be back again.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: The staff is really helpful! The hotel is really close to the Sky train . Great location . The rooms are spacious and clean . Great price for what you get ! Thank to the i residence hotel staff. Mauricio
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: My last stint at this hotel was say dispiriting. I promised not to visit despite being in a commendable location and value for money. However I throw in the towel as I was too lazy to search for another and wanted to be in Silom area without getting back to my previous accomodation.So, fast forward 2 yearish... And things are looking good. My pet peeve of no tolerance for bad service was assuaged when the varied staff I met during this stay provided  gracious hospitality. Had breakfast and though they were nothing to wow about, for the minimal added price to the room's rate was definitely good value. There was a Major renovation going on at the room 809 (was staying 808) but these guys had to do what they had to do to keep the place in good fashion. So in spite of the disturbances, it wasnt that big of a deal.One cavaet, rooms at least the one I stayed has super thin walls so be weary if you are a light sleeper.Side alleys has wondrous galore of food. Just be sure to visit during the weekdays.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

The major draw is that it is a 10－15 minute walk to the gay bars and literally 1 minute to Chong Nosi skytrain station.I would stay here again.

User Reviews: The hotel has extremely bad wifi, uncomfy bed, room not ready on time, ants in the room...We sent an email to management, and got no response.It is not recommended to stay at this hotel, since we had a very bad experience at your hotel.Although arriving late, around 10 pm, our room was not ready. When it became ready, we discovered that the room internet rarely works with the connection really bad as if it does not reach our room (Room 407), the beds are stiff as wood and very uncomfortable, the toilet door does not close, and many other unpleasant issues.We were surprised to find this at a hotel like yours. We booked here expecting something else based on the reviews and feedback.We tried to get support from the reception, but there is only little they can do. Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

User Reviews: This hotel has a great location - right at the Chong Nonsi BTS stop with an escalator up to the trains, across the street from Lek Seafood, around the corner from a super hamburger place and just a short walk to The Unnamed coffee/sandwich shop.  Street food is just a few steps away and nightlife along Silom is within walking distance.  The rooms are acceptable but there was some noise from hotel construction during the day.  Walls are thin so one can hear neighbors shutting doors but voices cannot be heard.  Housekeeping was good with fresh towels and clean bathroom; shower was hot and worked well.  Breakfast buffet was okay but less tasty than others that we have experienced.  Decent selection of Thai and western food - made to order omelets and selection of breads.  Disappointed in the salad options, lack of bacon, and the bland taste of the food.  Service was good.  Beautiful pool area especially at night, but the gym is a joke with only two machines.  Because of the location, I would stay here again.
Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

Name: I Residence Hotel Silom, Bangkok

There are few cons which we faced during our stay was, the AC remote was not working for my room, and the window blinds were so dusty., Moreover, the attitude of the reception staffs got changed after check out & they were so rude and harsh when I requested them for 4 paper of A4 print of our online boarding pass. Initially, I have requested to one of their gents staffs and as a favor he took the print for us & then this new lady whom I haven't met before on my 2 days stay suddenly got those printouts from him & was asking us to pay 60 baht for the printouts. I told her that he did not specified anything on this & just for 4 sheets of A4 we were asked to pay 60 baht..? she replied "even I can throw these papers but without paying 60 baht I will not issue these printouts." I felt like they badly wanted to deduct some money from our security deposit since we were eligible for the full deposit refund.

User Reviews: เข้าพักเพียงคืนเดียว และเลือกจองที่นี่เพราะเป็นเครือ UHG ที่เคยใช้บริการและเข้าพักมาก่อน เลยคาดหวังว่าน่าจะบริการได้มาตรฐานเดียวกันหมด แต่ตอนเช็คอิน กลับไม่เป็นไปตามที่คาดหวัง เพราะว่า วันที่เข้าพักได้โทรไปหาทางโรงแรมเพื่อแจ้งขอเปลี่ยนจากเตียงใหญ่เป็นเตียงคู่ (เนื่องจากเดินทางมากับพี่สาว) พอเช็คอิน GSA กลับไม่รู้เรื่อง ต้องเช็คห้องกันวุ่นวาย และให้รอจนถึง Check-in time คือ 14.00 น จึงได้ห้อง 922 (เข้าใจว่าเวลาเช็คอิน คือ บ่ายสอง) เมื่อเข้าไปถึงห้องกลับพบว่าเป้นเตียงใหญ่ (2 เตียงคู่ชนกัน) ต้องโทรแจ้ง Front ให้วุ่นวายอีกรอบ รอทาง Bell เอา Key card ใหม่มาเปลี่ยนให้ อีก 20 นาที เสียเวลามาก ได้ย้ายไปห่้องใหม่ 911 ซึ่ง Block View เลย และ ตลอดทางจากห้อง 922 ไปยังห้อง 910 แม่บ้านวางรถเข็น ตะกร้า กองผ้า ระเกะระกะ ไปหมด ความสะอาด ถือ ว่า สอบตก หากเทียบกับ เครือ UHG ที่อื่นที่เคยพัก ผ้าขนหนูก็ขอบยุ่ย, ปลั๊ก USB ในห้องที่มีก็ใช้งานไม่ได้, ห้องน้ำตรงฝักบัวมีคราบสกปรก และ ผนังห้องน้ำ มีคราบราดำไม่ต่างกัน อีกทั้งพนักงาน unfriendly ยกเว้น Bell ที่ทักทายตลอด ทั้ง ออกไป และ เข้ามา ห้องพัก ยังไม่สะอาดเท่าที่ควร มีคราบทั้งที่เก้าอี้ และ ผนังห้องน้ำ อาหารเช้ามีครบ ในราคาไม่แพง แต่พนักงานก็ไม่ค่อยเต็มใจให้บริการเท่าไหร่ ถ้าปรับปรุง Attitude พนักงาน และเพิ่ม service mind ไปอีกสักนิด จะดีกว่านี้ แต่หากให้ไปพักอีกคงไม่ครับ / หมายเหตุ ขอ late check out ถึง 13.30 แต่ กลับเข้ามาตอน 12.30 key card เปิดไมไ่ด้ ต้องเสียเวลา ลงไป Update key card กันอีก เสียเวลา เสียความรู้สึกครับ ทั้งที่แจ้ง GSA ไปแล้ว

User Reviews: Hotel staffs are very friendly and helpful. I asked for early check in before 12PM but arrived at 11AM. Staffs, K’Som and K’Deniz, prepared a room for me in only 30 minutes even though last night most of room were fully booked. Very impressed
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I received a complimentary early check-in assisted by the team of Deniz, Dome, and Som. The room is spacious overlooking swimming pool and shopping malls and it is not noisy at all even situated near the Lat Phrao junction. I like the workspace and Wi-Fi router provided in the room. On the contrary, the bathroom has a weird elevated step and need a little warning sign. Overall, it is of great value especially when booking under government’s subsidy scheme.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I stayed at this hotel for 5 days. The room was clean and quiet. The Internet was reliable. The breakfast had a large variety of foods including western and Thai. Any requests I made was taken care of in an efficient and professional manner. I also liked the fact that the metro was within walking distance.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Modern hotel with modern facilities. However have several big disadvantages:1. No soundproof. You can hear everything that next room speaking. Lucky if they not turn on TV. 2. When sleeping from air conditioner smoking smell is coming. Meaning that someone from other room was smoking and definitely it is very bad. My room was full of smoke smell. And during check out reception asked me: Were you smoking? I told no... and it is from air con. Definitely not pass new normal standards.3. Breakfast i would say very simple. Even no bacon. Coffee machine not set up properly and can make only espresso shot even that it is still need to press several times to get it done. Staff just chatting in reception area of entering for breakfast.4. Nobody measure temperature when enter hotel. So definitely not safe place.5. Hair on bed and toilet I foundDefinitely not stay again
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Thank you, Khun Dome, Khun Kworn, Khun Liya for taking care of us very well, and we will comeback again.Room so clean and the hotel is located good area near MRT as well, I like 7/11 in front of the hotel.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Great services by receptionists especially Dome and Liya. Affordable price and the room is very clean and quiet. There are many food promotions such as 10 percent discount for food and free welcome drink.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I’m here for several times. During my stay the staffs are very friendly and helpful. The views from the room are beautiful, Ladprao coty view. The hotel’s location is very convenince next to MRT Ladprao, very near 2 malls
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I choose to stay at The Quarter Ladprao for a few times already and I'm really appreciate stuff at front desk (K.Liya, K.John & K.Tarn), as usual with a warm welcome from the first moment you walk in. I can say that I will always choice to stay here when I have some errands in Bkk.

User Reviews: I just booked the room right after my arrival at DMK (an hour prior to check-in) and feel tired from travel. With Khun SOM and IMMY, I got the room as soon as I showed up at the hotel. I appreciated their organization.

User Reviews: Quick checking in with professional and friendly staff (Khun Jane), comfy bed and clean room. We will comeback here for sure. Thank you for giving us good experience to stay with you.Room 1620,1621 ,18-20 Sep 2020
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Special Thanks for very good assist to Som & Jida at reception counter. No matter how early checked in, during waiting for room you can join gym and swimming pool at 6 floor with free of charged.Nice city location, nice room, quite and clean.

User Reviews: I​ stayed​ there​ for​ shopping​ purposes.​ The​ hotel​ is​ just​ opposite​ the Union​ shopping​ mall  and​ not​ too​ far​ from​ Jatujak​ market.​ Room​ is​ comfortable​ for​ 1-2​ people, nice​ and​ clean.​ Staff​s were  friend​ly  especially the​ guy​ at​ reception.​I​ definitely will​ be​ there​ again.​
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: The Hotel is amazing! Very clean room with a large window, there is everything you need: towels, slippers, mini bar, etc. the swimming pool area is nice, you can get towels from the fitness center nearby. The staff was friendly. Special thanks to Oum, she was very polite and helpful!
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: The hotel is one of those semi condo converted to a hotel. Rooms are excellent. Clean, stocked minibar, Good shower. Although my rain shower was not working.The concierge staff is very helpful. Overall the staff is very friendly.Breakfast is very good for the price.The location is key though. Practically next door to Union Mall and MRT. 7 11 in front of the hotel.Really quiet.The only disappointment was Check out. It was slow. Took me 15 minutes. FO staff allowed guests to cut in. Nobody doing anything to perhaps make the process faster such as ask the room number of guests in advance and send information to housekeeping to check.Other than that a great stay.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: This is so great , im come here early , usually i might pay for fee because im check in early ,but The quarter so great they have hurried clear for our room and let me check in thank you K’mind & K’Noon so much.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: As titled, we were happy in overall. The water pressure in the shower has improved as compared to our last stay. Breakfast selections could have more variety, e.g hot noodles soup, pancakes, fresh juices. It will be perfect if the complimentary late check-out could be 4pm (since many rooms are vacant due to covid)Overall, we would be back for sure as it is really convenient for shopping.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: beautiful decoration ,close to MRT Phahon Yothin and central plaza Lad prow. Easy to transport and travel. Also has 7-11 in front of the building. so much convenient here!!. The receptionist, Aum and Karn kindly welcome us. thank you!! I would recommend to others
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I booked my stay through the hotel website from May 24 till end of the month, then I extended my stay as a walk in guest for 5 days, later on I extended my stay one more time for one week through booking.com to check out on June 12, after spending great 19 days stay. Hotel: very well operated and managed.Room: Nice and comfy. Room Price: Great value for money. Gym: very well equipped with attached studio for body weight workouts.Swimming pool: Crystal clear clean water with nice views.Parking: Free.HK: outstanding kind hardworking dedicated trustworthy  staff specially the lady who was on duty on my checkout day. Front Office: Kan, observant smart customer service oriented.Night shift gentlemen receptionist, helpful and decent. Som, good leadership skills, problem solving and complaints handling skills, but can be a bit more diplomatic and friendly. Parking/security man, helpful and friendly. HR: hired the best staff.Engineering: skillful technicians and perfect emergency/security system. Taxi driver: Sorakhom Nalampoon kind person and very good driver. Around the hotel: many shopping malls, supermarkets, church, Chatuchak market, sky train, underground Metro and parks. Many thanks for the Quarter Ladprao Hotel.Peter Ghaly.Room number: 1611
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I would like to recommend the hotel. The hotel is very good. Cleanliness, safety, transportation excellent service. Reception name "chat" she friendly and she help me anytime.just try it by yourself...:)
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: This was one out of five hotels I stayed at over a two month span. The Quarter Ladprao by UHG ranks at the top of them all. It very well may be one of the best hotels in Bangkok, especially when considering the amenities provided, the location, and the reasonable rates. Sure, not everyone's experience during their stay here is going to be the same but I think you'd really have to be searching for something to criticize to not enjoy yourself. The rooms were spacious and decorated in modern chic. The gym is fully functional proper gym. The pool is a rather nice size and presents a very comfortable area to lounge around. I thought the food was above average overall. The staff is terriffic- gym-side, poolside, in the restaurant, the housekeeping team, and the front desk staff. Everyone was friendly and helpful and always greeted guests with a smile. My most frequent interactions were with Mild, Chat, and Art at reception. They were service-friendly and did their best to address all of my inquiries and requests. They represent the entire Quarter Ladprao team extremely well. Good work Quarter Ladprao Hotel! I'm looking forward to staying with you again.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Thanks you so much receptionists Kan and Mild ,they are very friendly and helpful for early check-in 3 hours before the deal times to us - breakfart was good - good location near Central Ladproa. you can walk to there.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: The hotel room was spacious and new.Housekeeping changes all our bedsheets daily.Reception staff name:Chat,Kan and a tall guy which is very friendly and helpful,also especially 2 ladies restaurant staffs.I will definitely visit this hotel again.The Quarter hotel is really fortunate to have all this capable staffs who goes to the extra miles.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: thank you for good service Kan and Mild , i am so happy when have good hotel and good service like this early check in from this hotel it's amazing , i recommend to all people go here and try amazing service
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I am very happy with service,espacially room and facility(best), clean and quiet and best view. And The staffs(Mild and Chol) give me a warm, welcome and excellent service mind. Hopefully ,the next time i will come to visit here again. I recommended for fuve star service.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Absolutely loved our stay. Friendly staff, 7-eleven at the door. Union mall across the road and MRT around the corner and BTS 5 minutes walk. The pool was great as was the restaurant. Had no problems getting breakfast which was included with our room package. Not in the middle of the city center but that suited us with a 3 year old in tow. Heaps of good food in Union Mall. Xhatachuk market is only a station away either on the BTS or MRT. No kinds activities but a kids play room in the shops downstairs but kick boards are provided in the pool area.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: We stayed here for 8 nights and we will definitely come back.   Very friendly staff and good value for money. The hotel is located only 2-3 mins to MRT, Union Mall and 5 mins to Central Plaza.  The room was modern and clean, we liked the comfortable beds.  It has a well equipped gym and nice pool.  The breakfast was outstanding with variety of choices.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: The Hotel is near to the blue and green Sky Train line. The rooms are stylish, modern and clean as well. A big thank you for the great service from the employees. especially from Chat, Jida and Tan! :)We would come back anytime again!
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Oum and Chat were very nice. We arrived at the hotel around noon, but the check-in time was 2 pm. However, Oum and Chat helped us finding an available room, hence, we could do an early check-in immediately. The hotel is only 2 mins walking distance to the metro and about 10 mins walking to the sky train.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Very good location, near MRT and BTS, new hotell. Good breakfast, but I am not totally happy with the service:After finding out that our bathroom and toilet was not cleaned, took pictures and went down to the reception to complain, asked a boy there that I wanted to talk to the manger, he told me that he is not here, what can I help you with?I told him the story that when I came back to the room after a long day in town and putting on the cleaning sign, putting the towels on floor (as a sign that you want a new one as told in the hotell card) I see that its not cleaned and I have still the old towels just folded with the same dirt on them. He said ok sorry I will tell the manager and tried to look away.I don't know what's going on, but I expected that he came with the solution, but no.Then I told him what now? can you get some one to fix this. after that he turned backh and said ok.what is this? I don't need to ask for this, He should come up with solutions.Next I asked for a Thai massage service that they had with a A4 ad and price list , it was full booked for now they said, but they could fix this next day at 11:00. guess what nobody showed up the next day after waiting and changing of day plan. After another complain, they arranged for 20:00. the lady showed up 20:10 finally.By the way, never saw that they clean the room floor.I don't know why this happened, but I expect dem to be more professional.Never heared from the manager.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: This hotel is great, not only is it super reasonably priced for the service and amenities on offer/ location, but the overall feel of the hotel is that of a quality hotel.  I loved the gym, the pool and the restaurant, and of course the room was great.I am a bit of a conservationist, so I don't really like wasting material things.. This is why I was happy to see that the shower gel, shampoo and soap were all refillable.   This was great, because there was no waste in product packaging (also the three items were quite luxurious, made from really nice ingredients, that didn't dry my skin or hair at all).The front desk staff are really friendly and helpful.  I stayed for about 10 days in all so I kind of lived there a bit, Som in particular was so helpful.  She helped me plan where to go, how to get wherever I needed, and just general pleasant conversation, which I really appreciated.  All the staff did as much to make my stay as comfortable as possible. There was one funny incident (the first 3 days when I stayed on a different floor before moving).  There were two really loud women that were shouting/ talking at around 1-2 am.  I guess this sometimes happens (it's Bangkok) so maybe they were just rowdy from the night.  Apart from that all the guests were classy and kept noise to a minimum, or just enjoyed themselves without causing trouble to me or anyone else. All in all, a great place to stay, just outside the blue line (MRT) line, you get off at Phahon Yothin exit number 1 (this is incidentally the connecting station for the green BTS line, which is a 10 minute walk along the skywalk/ on the road/ or via the the mall if you go before the mall closes (at 10pm).  It's 1 minute outside exit 1 of the MRT line.  Very convenient.There's a 7-11 outside, which is great for all your daily essentials, well priced.For washing, I would recommend going to a launderette down the road (it's a 10 - 15  minute walk), on Soi 18, walk out the hotel, go on the main road and turn right, and continue walking for 10 -15 minutes, the launderette is called White Rabbit (costs about 40 baht for a wash/ 40 for a tumble dry etc).  Open at usual times of the day, and no queues when I went twice in the evenings.The food at Hilly's/ room service is so good.  I advise ordering the Thai dishes, they are so yummy and healthy.  I would avoid the western dishes (not many on the menu, but if you're in Thailand you may as well eat Thai food, you can eat your normal food when at home !).
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: We stayed here a couple of times and we will definitely come back. Very friendly staff, special thank to Oum Chart Som and to the doorbell. Very good value for money. We like the comfortable beds and the closeness to MRT and BTS train station.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I had been here for many times. The hotel located in the middle of two shopping malls. MRT station is located in front of the hotel which super convince for tourists. The hotel is surrounded by many restaurants. Moreover, the hotel has good facilities and services. The staffs are also very nice, especially khun.Nan and khun.Chat.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I picked this hotel due to its proximity to Chatuchak market and would use it as a great base again. The hotel staff were all really professional and welcoming, and the pool is a great size for Bangkok. Room was lovely and clean and everything made it an ideal spot for shopping.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: This is our 3rd time in this hotel and it is located conveniently close to Don Mueng airport and Jatujac weekend market. Breakfast is very delicious and the ladies at the reception are just amazing, Ms Jeda, especially, and others. And the pool is clean, and cool. We can only recomend this hotel. User Reviews: A bit far from bangkok center , if u are looking for a peaceful stay in Bangkok, go for it. To reach the center sky train facility is available, which is very convenient from the hotel. Staff behavior was very good. Have a nice stay at the hotel.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: One of the best hotels I have stayed in in Bangkok. And the best part is that it is immediately next to the metro stop ... so travel within Bangkok is easy. It has a nice swimming pool, nice lobby and the rooms are extremely well appointed. and nice wife signal in the room. Also nice mixture of European and Asian guests. Also, nice staff. User Reviews: The Quarter is strategically located beside Station 31 of the Blue Line MRT and across Union Mall. Location is convenient to cater with your immediate needs. Though the location is quite far from most tourist destinations, it will only take you 40 mins and cost you around 200 THB if you travel by Grab (car). The staff are great and very accommodating.

User Reviews: We immediately felt welcome in the hotel. Even though we arrived a couple of hours early for checkin, receptionists Chat and Oum were extremely helpful and arranged that we had a room (with a great view) ready and available almost immediately. This was particularly helpful after a long journey with a tired crying toddler.The other staff were also very helpful, arranging our luggage for us. The hotel is also conveniently located, the rooms are modern and  hotel facilities are great. I would definitely recommend to stay here.

Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Really nice hotel, great location just next to MRT and seven eleven. Close to Chatuchak Market. Stuff were friendy and polite Jida and Jane were helpful when we need something. I would recommend the hotel.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: We reached the Quarter after more than a full day of travel and it felt like an oasis. We arrived early because of flight times but Jida was extremely welcoming and understanding to help us get settled in :)
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Great hotel with a modern/minimalistic style in the rooms, has all the amenities that you'd need along with a great view of the city as well. Fairly easy to find, especially if you are arriving by subway/MRT which is just in front of the hotel, or you can spend 5 minutes walking from the skytrain/BTS to reach the property.Room was of standard size for Bangkok and has a balcony and spacious bathroom as well, and a great rain shower which is always a plus. Service was quick and efficient, in the evening I sat by the pool and had a couple of beers and G&T, which for the price value was excellent to just sit there and chill.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: 7 eleven right below the hotel. Plastic surgeon clinic right beside. Massage salon less than 1 min walk.  Good massage and reasonable price. A bit out of tourist place but Grab n taxis easy to get .There is a nail salon next door stated open every-day but we stayed there 4 days 3 night was not open at all.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Upon arrival we were early and Jida had checked us in and helped store luggage. We returned at 2pm and found a very updated room from what we may have expected. The pool area was nice had adjacent restaurant but lounges had no padding had to ask for pool towels. We stayed 2 nights and had a great experience. Food and drinks in hotel were priced as expected for this type of accommodation. Breakfast was included in our package. Mall across street and subway to access easily. Nice place would return.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Pleasant service and hospitality by Khaw, Jida and Jane. The check-in is very smooth and the room is clean. We would love to stay here again on our next visit to Bangkok. Should consider taking the breakfast next time.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I love their friendly and good service at The Quarter Ladprao. Due to earlier flight , I reached hotel before 10am . And I just try by chance to check the room availability for earlier check in with the staffs at reception ans they greet me friendly with a smile.. and said to me, “we will check for you now “ and within few minutes they manage to find a room for me. In addition , they explained to me the earlier check is subjected to the room availability and depend hotel traffic, .And I am totally understand it and accepted happily. I am so happy and they make my day as I need a room to take a rest now ... thanks to the staff , Mr Khaw, Ms Jida and Jane..Definitely come back again !!!!!

User Reviews: I want to THANK Liya for helping me solve EVERY problem that I encountered, and always wearing a big smile on her faceOf course this is her job, but she did more than that!飯店在MRT出口一上來轉灣就到、門口有711

User Reviews: We stayed 5 nights at the Quarter Ladprao after the Christmas. Staff are very friendly and helpful. The room is clean and the bed is comfortable. No microwave in the room likes the Quarter Ari, however the location is more convenient and easy to access to both MRT and BTS plus shopping centres nearby. Be aware of the room near the store room, it is noisy in the morning. The pool is decent size and the sitting area near the pool is spacious. The downside is smokey smell from the restaurant if there is a bbq cooking. The gym is good size and opens to both hotel guest and the public.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: We got a big and soft bed also with nice bathroom.Staff was very nice!There are service like Sauna, Drink and Showering after we checked out. LUV ITThe location is quite near to Department store.Security is great too.

User Reviews: The bed was as hard as the floor.I booked 3 nights but checked out after one sleepless night.This isn't a 4 star hotel.If you don't mind the concrete firm bed it's situated in a area with a few restaurants and shopping centre.7/11 next door.I will not be returning in 9 weeks travelling this year in Asia this is the worst bed and night's sleep.

User Reviews: I got very good service from staffs(Miss.Jida & Miss.Kan) Thanks for you kind. Clean room with good location for shopping , yummy street food and food court. Swimmimg pools and Fitness are good equipments. Have a coupon for welcome drink. I will be back again.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Art, Nan and Karl were so welcoming. Lovely environment and service! The whole area is very Christmas-y. There were nice tree and festive season decorations. Made our stay seem welcoming and special - thanks again!
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Our stay has been nothing but pleasant at the Quarter Hotel. From the moment we arrived we felt welcome and taken care of. They even give you welcome drink coupons that we later used at the restaurant. Deluxe room is definitely worth it. It is much bigger and nicer. We requested a quiet room on a high floor. That is exactly what we got. Our room was on the 12th floor facing a quiet alley. The view from the balcony was amazing at all hours of the day. Smart TV, comfortable bed, clean bathroom with the necessary toiletries, fridge, umbrella, safe, hangers and tea, coffee, water stocked daily, etc., everything we possibly needed was provided. The rooms are cleaned very well daily. The breakfast buffet is yummy with many choices. Every staff we met was super nice and always greeted us with a smile. The pool and the gym are very clean and nice. Poolside chairs and bean bags are perfect to lounge around on. During the evening they turn on the lights around the pool, and it looks so freaking romantic.Also bonus points, 7 eleven is right outside and MRT station is literally 1 minute walk. If you are taking the MRT get of at the Phahon yothin station! We got of at Lat phrao station and had to take a taxi to the hotel. Totally our fault.Only cons I want to mention is there was a bad smell coming from the toilet sometimes (maybe a piping problem), the bathroom and some of the furniture are showing some wear and tear. I hope the staff keep up the good work and maintenance and they will be golden!
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Location is superb with loads of stuff to eat around.Check in was a breeze with Liya / Art with their warm hospitality. Room is very trendy and modern. I would definitely recommend it for anyone looking for nice place to stay around
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Great location; a lot of restaurants and stores near the hotel, and the most important part in travelling is they have lot of access in transportation like train, taxi and etc. The front desk staff are really accommodating especially LIYA and AUM. They are also good in english. Thumbs up for these two! The breakfast buffet is quite good for 200+ thb. I wish there is cheese varieties to choose next time and more Thai foods. Over all, the best hotel in Bangkok is The Quarter Ladpra by UHG :) Affordable and Worth the experience.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: All staffs from Breakfasts/Dinning area in this hotel provide "Outstanding Customer Services" and perform extra miles job.  Each day, you will be greeted by them with "Beautiful smiling gesture" and they make you feel warm and welcome and  starting your day with wonderful experiences.  They are truly respectful and all are motivated to do excellent job on their duties. Our special thanks and appreciation to the Waiter/Waitress: Fame and Action, Mook, Nam, Au and many more staffs.  This is truly signature valuable Bangkok hotel which is held by these all excellent and fabulous staffs.  Highly recommend and welcome to this paradise.  Wishing all of you have a bright future!
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Great location and excelent service from Mr Keng very helpful guy to drop my luggage and order the taxi from his phone.The room is nice, have a pool and fitness center and close to the mall where we easy to find the food and some clothes we like. We suggest this hotel if you come to Thailand.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: The Quarter is very conveniently located. 1 min from the metro and 8 mins to the skytrain. You got 2 malls across the street. 3 mins from union mall and about 8 mins walk to central plaza mall. Food everywhere anytime. Breakfast is ok. Value for money. Keng and Bas at the concierge service were very helpful. They helped us to book a car everyday. Very satisfied.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: We stayed for 3 nights at this hotel.The location is very good, next to the metro station, not very far from the center. Nice hotel, clean, acceptable breakfast.The only minus is the noise (it has thin walls), but it compensates for a lovely staff that can help a lot if you need anything. If you find at the reception Oum, Best, or San, you're saved! They managed to do early check-in for us and change the room because of the noise.
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I lost my phone in Thailand.She help me lot and do everything she can do for me,I really appreciated.If you guys have a chance to visit Bangkok,please check this hotel.很感謝她能夠幫助我一起找手機，雖然最後沒有找回我的手機，但她的確幫了我很多，讓我感到很安慰，謝謝這位女櫃檯服務人員。
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: pros : - breakfast was fantastic, great choice and well made- good location for travel via Don Mueang International Airport- great location with easy access to the shopping mall just across the road- good bed and sleep, not fantastic at sound proof as we can hear noise from neighborscons:- room size wasn't great
Name: The Quarter Ladprao by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I really enjoyed my stay here. The staff went above and beyond from the moment I stepped through the doors, especially Coco! The room was beautiful and smelt amazing and the hotel has great facilities. I will definitely be back.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Another Bangkok staycation - so I decided to check out a new property in one of my favorite neighborhoods, Silom.     After I read the TA reviews and saw the incredible prices for the Quarter Silom, I booked using their website.    Check in and out were positive experiences as staff easily communicated in English.    But the reception area is small so I can see that it might get hectic with large groups.     Further, the parking situation is limited for but it’s easily accessible via the BTS or Grab car.   As mentioned the property is new so the room furnishing are very nice and there are plenty of outlets for devices.    They also have mood lighting which was a fun touch.     The bed and bedding are good quality and it was easy to fall asleep quickly.  Strong consistent wifi throughout the room and property; as well as a good AC system.    The shower pressure is strong and there was plenty of hot water.    The room also had a kettle, mini fridge, and microwave.   The hotel offers an inexpensive breakfast including Western and Thai offerings.   Overall the buffet was just ok and this would be an area that they could easily improve.       The property also has a well equipped fitness center including wet and dry saunas.    There’s also a small pool.      Overall - a very positive experience especially given their low rates.     I look forward to booking at one of their other properties.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I love this hotel. Everything is new in the perfect hotel. As a French man I can say this is the best hotel hospitality I ever get. Mr Aui check I’m with free upgrade from superior room to delux free of charge. I’m less than 5 mins the check im was done. All the staffs we met at the hotel were so nice and exchanged pleasantries with me. But K Aui did the best for me he knows how to make a guest happy and come back again. He explained to me about the facilities and so on. For me I will visit this hotel whenever UHG have membership card I would like to have it this hotel will make me to have platinum soon. Because I will visit more frequently. The location is good there’s BTS and MRT Tuk tuk nearby easy access to the hotel. And  also my favorite night club Koi at Sathorn tower is nearby So many Resturant too in that location there’s no new hotel with good facilities like This hotel with good rate too.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Simply a great place delivering fabulous value during this complicated period (March 2021).Perfection location, close to BTS, MRT, Sathorn Pier, local markets. Wonderful staff, very friendly and helpful - 5-star service!Brand new hotel with  great facilities (swimming pool, spa, fitness center) and a very comfortable room. There is absolutely nothing at the Quarter Silom that we did not like. Our 4-day stay was perfect, so much so that we already booked another 2 nights for when we are back in Bangkok in a few weeks.Highly recommended +++++
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: After long day with meeting at different workplace..i was tried and i have cancel my flight to back home .suddenly I found this hotel on the website...i book and heading to this hotel by walk becoz is just 5mins walk for business area (Sathon and Silom) ...Yes! Good feeling with warm welcome with the staff smile and speak clearly English.Not disappoint to booked this hotel ..good location in Silom soi 6 easy for access parking and internet..huge gym and close to night life such as Patphong ,Taniya Plaza ...i was great to fuel feel my missing home...Thanks for all staff to make me feel like home️
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I used to stay here for 10 day in January, the hotel was super nice and cheap. Good employees and all are able to speak proper english, this is definitely a plus. Back then the price was around 420baht a night. In March in decided to stay here for 1 night. The price is now about 200 Baht more but the service is still the same. Everything nice, good and super professional. The price is reasonable. The hotel is located near the Si Lom complex with nice restaurants and shops inside. It's close to the lumpini park (15min walking),  close to the Bts Sala Daeng (walking around 8min) and close to the MRT Si Lom (walking around 12min). For short and long stay I can highly recommend the Quarter. With a motorcycle it's only 10min from Asok/ Sukhumvit where the Terminal 21 is located. The Quarter is not a skyscraper hotel.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: The hotel is located in the heart of Silom area which is very convenient to get around and lots of good food. Fast and organized check-in process. We had a pleasure stay thanks to great service by khun Beam.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I have planned to surprise my boss anniversary. Surprisingly, I’ve got a super handful guest service Mr.Aui he help me alot.  It’s really impressive to get a helpful staff without any excuse or condition and make it happen. next chance i might be there again
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Near my office very convinience located silom road and surawong, hotel is new in the room big smart tv connect to wifi and netflix, walk in early have staff 24 hours. front staff very helpful and friendly khob jai Mr.Aui for service will come back again.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Amazing stuffs, great swimming pool& facilities. Patrick is probably the best guy in BKK. Always around to help and assist. Beam and Sky also have been helpful & friendly. I hope to seem them again! Must visit
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: A must try experience for friendly-budgey hotel! Came across this property on Agoda with special discount so didn't expect much out of it... Surprisingly it turned out to be a hidden gem!!! This new property is located in Silom area with walking distance to MRT/BTS, local market & shopping mall. Room is very nice & clean providing almost all necessities for my stay. I absolutely enjoy all the facilities from smart tv (Netflix etc.) especially the lighting function that can be switched its color!! So much fun. Pool, Gym, Sauna etc.. what else I can ask more.. The staff are all friendly and service-minded from security, front desk, bellboy and housekeeping. Thank you! The only thing that disturb me is noise from neighbors since wall is quite thin I guess .. There are some shouting & crying children... Anyway, still worth every single penny and will absolutely come back!!
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: New hotel everything is new modern design. Lobby is large beautiful sofa.  Near 2 station saladaeng bts and mrt silom shopping mall silom complex chamchuri square samyan mitrtown everything was valued staff friendly and help full thank you khun Aui for take care my stayed.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: All hotel service and facilities are very good have ever stayed in every hotel before. Staffs very helpful with service mind, especially Beam for serving the best accommodation. Will come back soon as soon as possible
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I visited this hotel twice with 2 different locations. First one had no late check-out applied. The second one I booked a Pool-view Superior room for 2 nights. Look what I got. What else can I say literally. Great pool ever!!
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Good location. not far from BTS. New and modern hotel. Very good service front desk staff name Mickey help me. Very good facilites especially fitness center and swimmimg pool. The most important thing is cheap! Next time will come again for sure!
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I stay was amazing at this place breakfast was tasty and buffet a room was very clean and new I happy to stay here staff was amazing and helpful staff AUI and  pictrick and pit all time well come and care customer service  his helpful us go make planning to shopping good local attractions at bangkok
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: New hotel with good location. Near BTS Sala Daeng . Room small, but comfortable and clean. Very friendly and helpfull hotel staff, all of them.  For sure  we will come back to stay here again, if we needed
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Hotel is new and stylish. The price I got while covid situation is unbelievable 600+ with breakfast. All staff is well trained with excellent  service mind especially the guy named "Raymond". He ask me to wash my own container that I bring my own vegetarian dish without my asking for help. Everyone also speak perfect english. The breakfast is various and different everyday for thai food, soup and fruit. Perfect for all. Cleanliness is also great.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I was hooked with the design when I booked in a reasonable! When checked the receptionist and bell man was very helpful and accommodating! My room was clean and comfy bed. The bathroom was my favorite! I just wish they have more toiletries. The breakfast buffet has plenty of options you can choose that surely satisfied my tummy. Raymond and all the staff offered an exceptional service! I will surely goin back here!
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Loved the amenities and staff name is NOEY and best they are good serving mine ️ .Good location relative to a bunch of landmarks made this a nice last stop for us in Thailand. Housecleaning was excellent, hotel sold cheap bottled water, and their cafe is pretty nice too.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: The staff are exceptional!! They’re so amazing, they go out of their way to make their guests comfortable and pleasant with their warm and kind service. The thing that they take the effort to do for me was awesome. I don’t have enough words to describe the brilliance of them.The room was quite spacious for couple and it was so clean. Bedding and pillows very comfy. TV channel as Netflix didn’t make me bored to stayed for 2 nights and this hotel also conveniently located to BTS and MRT. I’ll surely come back to this The Quarter Silom again and again.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: It was a truly great stay, very professional and friendly staffs. Excellent hospitality and was upgraded to a better room. Love the bed so comfy and modern design especially with in-room multi color lighting system. Highly recommend! Will come back some other times :)ATHENA P.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: The design of this hotel is amazing.  Got gimmicks from the exterior, the room and the lobby.  I like the location because it’s walkable to Silom road, BTS, MRT, shopping, and there’re many good restaurants and coffee shops nearby. Cheap rates. Very great value.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: the room were very nice, the staff at restaurant toom, tarr, front staff was very attentive.................. will definitely come.back.here.for stay. though there still.some.works.going on but it.didnt.disturb me.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I really enjoyed my stay here. The staff went above and beyond from the moment I stepped through the doors, especially Coco! The room was beautiful and smelt amazing and the hotel has great facilities. I will definitely be back.

Check in and out were positive experiences as staff easily communicated in English.    But the reception area is small so I can see that it might get hectic with large groups.     Further, the parking situation is limited for but it’s easily accessible via the BTS or Grab car.   As mentioned the property is new so the room furnishing are very nice and there are plenty of outlets for devices.    They also have mood lighting which was a fun touch.     The bed and bedding are good quality and it was easy to fall asleep quickly.  Strong consistent wifi throughout the room and property; as well as a good AC system.    The shower pressure is strong and there was plenty of hot water.    The room also had a kettle, mini fridge, and microwave.   The hotel offers an inexpensive breakfast including Western and Thai offerings.   Overall the buffet was just ok and this would be an area that they could easily improve.       The property also has a well equipped fitness center including wet and dry saunas.    There’s also a small pool.      Overall - a very positive experience especially given their low rates.     I look forward to booking at one of their other properties.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I love this hotel. Everything is new in the perfect hotel. As a French man I can say this is the best hotel hospitality I ever get. Mr Aui check I’m with free upgrade from superior room to delux free of charge. I’m less than 5 mins the check im was done. All the staffs we met at the hotel were so nice and exchanged pleasantries with me. But K Aui did the best for me he knows how to make a guest happy and come back again. He explained to me about the facilities and so on. For me I will visit this hotel whenever UHG have membership card I would like to have it this hotel will make me to have platinum soon. Because I will visit more frequently. The location is good there’s BTS and MRT Tuk tuk nearby easy access to the hotel. And  also my favorite night club Koi at Sathorn tower is nearby So many Resturant too in that location there’s no new hotel with good facilities like This hotel with good rate too.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Simply a great place delivering fabulous value during this complicated period (March 2021).Perfection location, close to BTS, MRT, Sathorn Pier, local markets. Wonderful staff, very friendly and helpful - 5-star service!Brand new hotel with  great facilities (swimming pool, spa, fitness center) and a very comfortable room. There is absolutely nothing at the Quarter Silom that we did not like. Our 4-day stay was perfect, so much so that we already booked another 2 nights for when we are back in Bangkok in a few weeks.Highly recommended +++++
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: After long day with meeting at different workplace..i was tried and i have cancel my flight to back home .suddenly I found this hotel on the website...i book and heading to this hotel by walk becoz is just 5mins walk for business area (Sathon and Silom) ...Yes! Good feeling with warm welcome with the staff smile and speak clearly English.Not disappoint to booked this hotel ..good location in Silom soi 6 easy for access parking and internet..huge gym and close to night life such as Patphong ,Taniya Plaza ...i was great to fuel feel my missing home...Thanks for all staff to make me feel like home️
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I really enjoyed my stay here. The staff went above and beyond from the moment I stepped through the doors, especially Coco! The room was beautiful and smelt amazing and the hotel has great facilities. I will definitely be back.
Name: The Quarter Silom by UHG Hotel, Bangkok

Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: It was an excellent experience.Great service and staffs, espectially K.OAD assisted throughout my stay Great  Please Keep up the good job.Location The hotel is good located with walking distance to MRT Hualamphon,Starbucks, and Chinatown Great room Clean and the terrace are Stunning for seeing the sunset.Best value for money and definitely worth revisiting.
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Great service and staffs, espectially K.Phol and K.Best who assisted throughout my stayGreat location: The hotel is located in BKK city center with walking distance to MRT Hualamphon, concenient stores (7-11), Starbucks, and ChinatownGreat room: Clean and space out room with panoramic view.Best value for money and definitely worth revisiting
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Great staff Excellent service, great location, In addition the room is really big spacious and clean I will for sure return to this hotel on my next visits to Bangkok Thanks  to POND NOEY for everything
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: The hotel is located in the city centre, accessible by both MRT, train, bus and taxi alike. It is only 5 minutes on foot from the famous Bangkok Train Station and MRT Hua Lampong Station. Situated on the 12th Floor, the hotel offers a panoramic view of Bangkok city centre and old town. Did we mention that the hotel is only 10 minutes walk from the Chinatown? Besides Chinatown there are other attractions nearby.The lobby is modern and spacious. There we met attentive and helpful staff. Khun Noey (เนย) and Khun Pound (ปอนด์) who assisted us through check-in. The deal we got for superior room with breakfast was undeniable. We can only say this hotel offers the best value for money we paid.
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: good place clean and staff name Noey and Oat are very service  staffi recommended who want to look for place in the mid of city where can find the shopping center and good place to eat i recommended here.
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Service good staff name is PRAEW, Oad and DAY.  They are friendly, Service mind. Give me good room with good price near china town. You can enjoy walking to china town for eat street food very easy. And you can go to shopping at the sampeng merket its not far
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I like staff here too much very good serviceI stay many nights staff very helpfullHotel good location and cleanI will come back to stay here againI recomend every one come to stay hereThe best service spacially Praw,Day,Oad
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: The staff at this property are all great! They all go above and beyond to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. ( Preaw , Oat , Day are the best staff ever ) Please give your staff awards! I highly recommend this place for you all
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: I booking mistake wrong date check in but satff very nice to helpfull for contact agoda for chang date chack in and good location the satff k. Praew and k. Noey verry nice the hotel good price i will recoment to stay here
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: Got a good service from hotel staffs, futhurmore, the hotel has a very good atmosphere with nice decoration. The sky view of China town is perfect place to hangout. Upper room decoration in chinese style suit with Bangkokian to change from staying home to upper air view of city heart.
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: As I see the hotel is one of UHG group, I choose to stay here for a night before the next trip. The place is well decorated in Thai-Chinese style, also decorated to celebrate Christmas and New Year. The staffs here are really nice, especially Khun Noey and Khun Oat. I’m sure you won’t regret since it was build to be harmonized to its surroundings.
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: The hotel staff (Pond) is helpful and provided great service. The room is big and clean with fully equipped facilities. The location is great, closes to MRT station and all interesting spots (temple, Chinatown, city center)
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: This hotel is near the MRT and Train station so you can walk about 5 minutes. The receptionist(K’Noey) was very nice and helpful with service mind. I was asking for the early check-in and She wasn’t rejected my request. Hotel decorations are Luxury and Modern. The Room is huge and the facilities is quite good such as Netflix, Youtube and news. And the view from the room is so stunning. Next time I will stay here for sure!!
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok

User Reviews: The hotel is a short walk to a street food lane called Soi Sukorn where the local Thai would come eat at street vendors’ pop-up shops each night.  It’s also close to Chinatown and central station.  Next time I will ride the train and explore the countryside.  The room is spacious and designed in modern Chinese theme.  I didn’t try the breakfast.  The view from the function room is amazing.
Name: The Quarter Hualamphong By UHG Hotel, Bangkok
